definitionList.name: RESET
descriptionList: This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and the gNB-DU and is used to request that the F1 interface, or parts of the F1 interface, to be reset.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU gNB-DU and gNB-DU gNB-CU

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of UE-associated logical F1-connections allowed to reset in one message. Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: RESET ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList: This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and the gNB-DU as a response to a RESET message.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-DU gNB-CU and gNB-CU gNB-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of UE-associated logical F1-connections allowed to reset in one message. Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: ERROR INDICATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by both the gNB-CU and the gNB-DU and is used to indicate that some error has been detected in the node.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU gNB-DU and gNB-DU gNB-CU

definitionList.name: GNB-CU CONFIGURATION UPDATE FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate gNB-CU Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a gNB-DU, to express the desired resource allocation for data traffic, for the sake of resource coordination. The message triggers gNB-DU resource coordination (for NR-initiated resource coordination), to indicate an initial resource offer by the E-UTRA node (for E-UTRA-initiated gNB-DU Resource Coordination), or to indicate the agreed resource allocation that is to be executed.

elementList.name: E-UTRA – NR Cell Resource Coordination Request Container
elementList.description: In EN-DC case, includes the X2AP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST message as defined in subclause 9.1.4.24 in TS 36.423 [9]. In NG-RAN cases, includes the XnAP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST message as defined in subclause 9.1.2.23 in TS 38.423 [28].

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-DU to a gNB-CU, to express the desired resource allocation for data traffic, as a response to the GNB-DU RESOURCE COORDINATION REQUEST.

elementList.name: E-UTRA – NR Cell Resource Coordination Response Container
elementList.description: In EN-DC case, includes the X2AP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE message as defined in subclause 9.1.4.25 in TS 36.423 [9]. In NG-RAN cases, includes the XnAP E-UTRA – NR CELL RESOURCE COORDINATION RESPONSE message as defined in subclause 9.1.2.24 in TS 38.423 [28].

definitionList.name: GNB-DU STATUS INDICATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate to the gNB-CU its status of overload.

definitionList.name: F1 REMOVAL REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by either the gNB-DU or the gNB-CU to intiate the removal of the interface instance and the related resources.

definitionList.name: F1 REMOVAL RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by either the gNB-DU or the gNB-CU to acknowledge the initiation of removal of the interface instance and the related resources.

definitionList.name: F1 REMOVAL FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by either the gNB-DU or the gNB-CU to indicate that removing the interface instance and the related resources cannot be accepted.

definitionList.name: NETWORK ACCESS RATE REDUCTION
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to indicate to the gNB-DU a need to reduce the rate at which UEs access the network.

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by gNB-CU to gNB-DU to initiate the requested measurement according to the parameters given in the message.

elementList.name: gNB-CU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU

elementList.name: gNB-DU Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-DU

elementList.name: Registration Request
elementList.description: Type of request for which the resource status is required.

elementList.name: Report Characteristics
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates measurement object the gNB-DU is requested to report. First Bit = PRB Periodic, Second Bit = TNL Capacity Ind Periodic, Third Bit = Composite Available Capacity Periodic, Fourth Bit = HW LoadInd Periodic, Fifth Bit = Number of Active UEs Periodic, Sixth Bit = NR-U Channel List Periodic. Other bits shall be ignored by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Cell To Report List
elementList.description: Cell ID list to which the request applies.

elementList.name: SSB To Report List
elementList.description: SSB list to which the request applies.

elementList.name: Slice To Report List
elementList.description: S-NSSAI list to which the request applies.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN

elementList.name: Reporting Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity that can be used for reporting of indicated measurements. Also used as the averaging window length for all measurement object if supported. This IE is ignored if the Registration Request IE is set to “add”.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.
Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a gNB node cell. Value is 64.
Maximum no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 1024.
Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in a cell. Value is 12.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Registration Request IE is set to the value "stop" or "add".
This IE shall be present if the Registration Request IE is set to the value "start".

elementList.name: NR-U Channel ID
elementList.description: Identifies a portion of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth on which channel access procedure in shared spectrum has been performed in the last reporting period.

elementList.name: Channel Occupancy Time Percentage DL
elementList.description: The percentage of time for which the channel resources have been utilised for DL traffic served by the corresponding NR-U Channel of the serving cell. Value 100 indicates that the channel resources have been utilized for DL traffic served by the corresponding NR-U Channel of the serving cell for the whole duration between consecutive reporting.

elementList.name: Energy Detection Threshold DL
elementList.description: Average ED Threshold used for DL channel sensing at the gNB. Value is in dBm.

elementList.name: Channel Occupancy Time Percentage UL
elementList.description: The percentage of time for which the channel resources have been utilised for UL traffic served by the corresponding NR-U Channel of the serving cell for UEs that transmit to the serving cell. Value 100 indicates that the channel resources have been utilized for UL traffic served by the corresponding NR-U Channel of the serving cell for the whole duration between consecutive reporting.

elementList.name: Radio Resource Status NR-U
elementList.description: Indicates the radio resource status per NR-U channel.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.
Maximum no. NR-U Channel IDs in a cell. Value is 16.

descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to notify the gNB-CU that the QoS for already established DRBs associated with notification control is not fulfilled any longer or it is fulfilled again.

elementList.description: As per Trace ID in Trace Activation IE

descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to to transfer trace specific information.

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: For File based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [29]. Should be ignored if URI is present

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity URI
elementList.description: For Streaming based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [29] Replaces Trace Collection Entity IP Address if present

definitionList.name: CU-DU RADIO INFORMATION TRANSFER
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a gNB-DU, to convey radio-related information.

elementList.name: BH Routing Information Removed List Item

elementList.description: The buffer size threshold (in kilobytes) for DL local rerouting, triggered by hop-by-hop flow control feedback.

elementList.name: BAP Header Rewriting Added List Item

elementList.description: If present, indicates that the egress BAP Routing ID in the present BAP header rewriting entry pertains to the non-F1-terminating IAB-donor topology of the boundary IAB-node.

elementList.name: BAP Header Rewriting Removed List Item

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of routing entries, the maximum value is 1024.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to acknowledge the reception of an GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION message.

definitionList.name: GNB-DU RESOURCE CONFIGURATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate a gNB-DU Resource Configuration Update failure.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL ADDRESS REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request the allocation of IP addresses for IAB-node(s).

elementList.name: IAB TNL Addresses To Remove List
IAB TNL Addresses To Remove Item

elementList.description: The usage of the allocated IPv4 or IPv6 address or IPv6 address prefix.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL ADDRESS FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate an IAB TNL Address Allocation failure.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: REFERENCE TIME INFORMATION REPORTING CONTROL

definitionList.name: REFERENCE TIME INFORMATION REPORT
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU and is used to report the accurate reference time information to the gNB-CU.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING ASSISTANCE INFORMATION FEEDBACK
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to give feedback on positioning assistance information broadcasting.

elementList.name: Positioning Assistance Information Failure List
elementList.description: Contains the Assistance Information Failure List IE as defined in TS 38.455 [37].

elementList.name: Positioning Broadcast Cells
elementList.description: The cells associated to the feedback provided in the Positioning Assistance Information Failure List IE.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request the gNB-DU to configure a positioning measurement.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

elementList.name: Positioning Measurement Periodicity
elementList.description: The codepoint 120ms, 240ms, 480ms, 1024ms, 2048ms, 1min, 6min, 12min, and 30min are not applicable.

elementList.name: Positioning Measurement Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (gNB RX-TX, UL-SRS-RSRP, UL AoA, UL RTOA, …, Multiple UL AoA, UL SRS-RSRPP, UL-RSCP)
elementList.description: The UL-RSCP measurement is applicable only when the UL-RTOA and/or gNB-RxTxTimeDiff measurement(s) is also requested.

elementList.name: Timing Reporting Granularity Factor
elementList.description: TS 38.133 [38] This IE is ignored when the Timing Reporting Granularity Factor Extended IE is included.

elementList.name: Timing Reporting Granularity Factor Extended
elementList.description: Value -6 corresponds to kminus6, value -5 corresponds to kminus5, and so on, see TS 38.133 [38].

elementList.name: SFN Initialisation Time
elementList.description: If this IE is not present, the TRP may assume that the value is same as its own SFN initialisation time.

elementList.name: Measurement Beam Information Request
elementList.description: This IE is ignored when the Measurement characteristics Request Indicator IE is included.

elementList.name: Response Time
elementList.description: This IE is ignored when the Positioning Report Characteristics IE is set to “Periodic”.

elementList.name: Positioning Measurement Amount
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Positioning Report Characteristics IE is set to ‘OnDemand’. Value 0 represents an infinite number of periodic reporting.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 16384.
Maximum no. of TRPs that can be included within one measurement message. Value is 64.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Positioning Report Characteristics IE is set to the value "Periodic".
This IE shall be present if the Positioning Measurement Periodicity IE is set to the value "extended".

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT RESPONSE

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRP measurements that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to report measurement failure.

definitionList.name: POSITIONING MEASUREMENT REPORT

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The Cell ID of the TRP identified by the TRP ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of TRP measurements that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate that the previously requested positioning measurements can no longer be reported.

descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to update a previously configured measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maxmum no. of TRPs that can be included within one message. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: E-CID MEASUREMENT INITIATION REQUEST

elementList.description: The codepoint “extended” is not applicable. This IE is not applicable to NR Angle of Arrival.

descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to notify the gNB-CU about changes of the multicast context.

elementList.name: Multicast DU to CU RRC Information

definitionList.name: MULTICAST CONTEXT NOTIFICATION CONFIRM
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to notify the gNB-DU to confirm the execution of the requested functions.

definitionList.name: MULTICAST CONTEXT NOTIFICATION REFUSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to notify the gNB-DU that the execution of the requested functions was not successful.

definitionList.name: MULTICAST COMMON CONFIGURATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request the gNB-DU to configure common items in the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Multicast CU to DU Common RRC Information

definitionList.name: MULTICAST COMMON CONFIGURATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to notify the gNB-CU to confirm the execution of the requested functions.

definitionList.name: MULTICAST COMMON CONFIGURATION REFUSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to notify the gNB-CU that the execution of the requested functions was not successful.

definitionList.name: PDC MEASUREMENT INITIATION REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by gNB-CU to initiate PDC measurements.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of PDC measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 16. Maximum is 1 in this release.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the PDC Report Type IE is set to the value "Periodic".

definitionList.name: PDC MEASUREMENT INITIATION RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by gNB-DU to indicate that the requested PDC measurement is successfully initiated.

definitionList.name: PDC MEASUREMENT INITIATION FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by gNB-DU to indicate that the requested PDC measurement cannot be initiated.

definitionList.name: PDC MEASUREMENT REPORT
descriptionList: This message is sent by gNB-DU to report the results of the requested PDC measurement.

definitionList.name: PDC MEASUREMENT TERMINATION COMMAND
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request the gNB-DU to terminate an ongoing periodical PDC measurement.

definitionList.name: PDC MEASUREMENT FAILURE INDICATION
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate that the previously requested PDC measurements can no longer be reported.

definitionList.name: QOE INFORMATION TRANSFER
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-CU to a gNB-DU, to indicate information related to RAN visible QoE.

elementList.name: DRB List Item
elementList.description: The List of DRBs corresponding to the QoE Information.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of QoE information for one UE, the maximum value is 16.
Maximum no. of DRBs allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: QOE INFORMATION TRANSFER CONTROL
descriptionList: This message is sent by a gNB-DU to the gNB-CU, to control the QoE information transfer.

elementList.name: Deactivate ALL
elementList.description: This choice indicates that RAN visible QoE reporting pertaining to all the UEs served by the gNB-DU, should be deactivated.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of UEs for which QoE transfer control information is received, the maximum value is 512.

definitionList.name: TIMING SYNCHRONISATION STATUS REQUEST
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU to request the gNB-DU to start or stop reporting of RAN timing synchronization status information.

definitionList.name: TIMING SYNCHRONISATION STATUS RESPONSE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to confirm the request to start or stop reporting of RAN timing synchronization status information.

definitionList.name: TIMING SYNCHRONISATION STATUS FAILURE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to indicate that reporting of RAN timing synchronisation status information cannot be initiated.

definitionList.name: TIMING SYNCHRONISATION STATUS REPORT
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-DU to report RAN timing synchronisation status information.

definitionList.name: Message Type
descriptionList: The Message Type IE uniquely identifies the message being sent. It is mandatory for all messages.

elementList.name: Type of Message
elementList.type: CHOICE (Initiating Message, Successful Outcome, Unsuccessful Outcome, ...)

definitionList.name: Cause
descriptionList: The purpose of the Cause IE is to indicate the reason for a particular event for the F1AP protocol.

elementList.name: Radio Network Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, RL failure-RLC, Unknown or already allocated gNB-CU UE F1AP ID, Unknown or already allocated gNB-DU UE F1AP ID, Unknown or inconsistent pair of UE F1AP ID, Interaction with other procedure, Not supported QCI Value, Action Desirable for Radio Reasons, No Radio Resources Available, Procedure cancelled, Normal Release, ..., Cell not available, RL failure-others, UE rejection, Resources not available for the slice(s), AMF initiated abnormal release, Release due to Pre-Emption, PLMN not served by the gNB-CU, Multiple DRB ID Instances, Unknown DRB ID, Multiple BH RLC CH ID Instances, Unknown BH RLC CH ID, CHO-CPC resources to be changed, NPN not supported, NPN access denied, gNB-CU Cell Capacity Exceeded, Report Characteristics Empty, Existing Measurement ID, Measurement Temporarily not Available, Measurement not Supported For The Object, Unknown BAP address, Unknown BAP routing ID, Insufficient UE Capabilities, SCG activation deactivation failure, SCG deactivation failure due to data transmission, Requested Item not Supported on Time, Unknown or already allocated gNB-CU MBS F1AP ID, Unknown or already allocated gNB-DU MBS F1AP ID, Unknown or inconsistent pair of MBS F1AP ID, Unknown or inconsistent MRB ID, TAT-SDT expiry, LTM command triggered, SSB not Available)

elementList.name: Transport Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, Transport Resource Unavailable, ..., Unknown TNL address for IAB, Unknown UP TNL information for IAB)

elementList.name: Protocol Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Transfer Syntax Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Reject), Abstract Syntax Error (Ignore and Notify), Message not Compatible with Receiver State, Semantic Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Falsely Constructed Message), Unspecified, ...)

elementList.name: Miscellaneous Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Control Processing Overload, Not enough User Plane Processing Resources, Hardware Failure, O&M Intervention, Unspecified, ...)

definitionList.name: Criticality Diagnostics
descriptionList: The Criticality Diagnostics IE is sent by the gNB-DU or the gNB-CU when parts of a received message have not been comprehended or were missing, or if the message contained logical errors. When applicable, it contains information about which IEs were not comprehended or were missing.
For further details on how to use the Criticality Diagnostics IE, (see clause 10). The conditions for inclusion of the Transaction ID IE are described in clause 10.

elementList.name: Procedure Code
elementList.description: Procedure Code is to be used if Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure, and not within the response message of the same procedure that caused the error.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(initiating message, successful outcome, unsuccessful outcome)
elementList.description: The Triggering Message is used only if the Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure.

elementList.name: Procedure Criticality
elementList.description: This Procedure Criticality is used for reporting the Criticality of the Triggering message (Procedure).

elementList.name: IE Criticality
elementList.description: The IE Criticality is used for reporting the criticality of the triggering IE. The value 'ignore' is not applicable.

elementList.name: IE ID
elementList.description: The IE ID of the not understood or missing IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of IE errors allowed to be reported with a single message. The value for maxnoofErrors is 256.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
descriptionList: The gNB-CU UE F1AP ID uniquely identifies the UE association over the F1 interface within the gNB-CU.

NOTE: 	If F1-C signalling transport is shared among multiple interface instances, the value of the gNB-CU UE F1AP ID is allocated so that it can be associated with the corresponding F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
descriptionList: The gNB-DU UE F1AP ID uniquely identifies the UE association over the F1 interface within the gNB-DU.

NOTE: 	If F1-C signalling transport is shared among multiple interface instances, the value of the gNB-DU UE F1AP ID is allocated so that it can be associated with the corresponding F1-C interface instance.

definitionList.name: RRC-Container
descriptionList: This information element contains a gNB-CUUE or a UE  gNB-CU message that is transferred without interpretation in the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: SRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a SRB for a UE.

elementList.name: SRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the identities of SRB as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. Value 0 indicates SRB0, value 1 indicates SRB1, etc.

definitionList.name: DRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a DRB for a UE.

elementList.name: DRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the DRB-Identity IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: gNB-DU ID
descriptionList: The gNB-DU ID uniquely identifies the gNB-DU at least within a gNB-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU ID
elementList.description: The gNB-DU ID is independently configured from cell identifiers, i.e. no connection between gNB-DU ID and cell identifiers.

definitionList.name: Served Cell Information
descriptionList: This IE contains cell configuration information of a cell in the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: NR PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell ID

elementList.name: 5GS TAC
elementList.description: 5GS Tracking Area Code

elementList.name: Served PLMNs
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMNs in SIB 1 associated to the NR Cell Identity in the NR CGI IE

elementList.name: TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: NPN Support Information
elementList.description: Supported NPNs per PLMN.

elementList.name: Extended TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Additional Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: TAI NSAG Support List
elementList.description: NSAG information associated with the slices per TAC, per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: UL FreqInfo
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “dl-only”.

elementList.name: DL FreqInfo
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “ul-only”.

elementList.name: UL Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “dl-only”.

elementList.name: DL Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Cell Direction IE is included and set to “ul-only”.

elementList.name: UL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the UL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DL Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the DL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Transmission Bandwidth asymmetric IE is present.

elementList.name: TDD UL-DL Configuration Common NR
elementList.description: Includes the tdd-UL-DL-ConfigurationCommon contained in the ServingCellConfigCommon IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: Transmission Bandwidth asymmetric
elementList.description: Indicates the asymmetric UL and DL transmission bandwidth.

elementList.name: NR-U Channel ID
elementList.description: Index to uniquely identify the part of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth consisting of a contiguous set of resource blocks (RBs) on which a channel access procedure is performed in shared spectrum. Value 1 represents the first part of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth on which a channel access procedure is performed. Value 2 represents the second part of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth on which a channel access procedure is performed, and so on.

elementList.name: NR-U ARFCN
elementList.description: It represents the centre frequency of the NR-U Channel Bandwidth for NR bands restricted to operation with shared spectrum channel access, as defined in TS 37.213 [46]. Allowed values are specified in TS 38.101-1 [26] in Table 5.4.2.3-2, Table 5.4.2.3-3 and Table 5.4.2.3-4.

elementList.name: Measurement Timing Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the MeasurementTimingConfiguration inter-node message defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Extended Served PLMNs List
elementList.description: This is included if more than 6 Served PLMNs is to be signalled.

elementList.name: TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: NPN Support Information
elementList.description: Supported NPNs per PLMN.

elementList.name: Extended TAI Slice Support List
elementList.description: Additional Supported S-NSSAIs per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: TAI NSAG Support List
elementList.description: NSAG information associated with the slices per TAC, per PLMN or per SNPN.

elementList.name: Broadcast PLMN Identity Info List
elementList.description: This IE corresponds to the PLMN-IdentityInfoList IE and the NPN-IdentityInfoList IE (if available) in SIB1 as specified in TS 38.331 [8]. All PLMN Identities and associated information contained in the PLMN-IdentityInfoList IE and NPN identities and associated information contained in the NPN-IdentityInfoList IE (if available) are included and provided in the same order as broadcast in SIB1. NOTE: In case of NPN-only cell, the PLMN Identities and associated information contained in the PLMN-IdentityInfoList IE are not included.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity List
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN IDs in SIB1 associated to the NR Cell Identity IE

elementList.name: Configured TAC Indication
elementList.description: NOTE: This IE is associated with the 5GS TAC in the Broadcast PLMN Identity Info List IE

elementList.name: NPN Broadcast Information
elementList.description: If this IE is included the content of the PLMN Identity List IE and Extended PLMN Identity List IE if present in the Broadcast PLMN Identity Info List IE is ignored.

elementList.name: Configured TAC Indication
elementList.description: NOTE: This IE is associated with the 5GS TAC on top-level of the Served Cell Information IE

elementList.name: Aggressor gNB Set ID
elementList.description: This IE indicates the associated aggressor gNB Set ID of the cell

elementList.name: Victim gNB Set ID
elementList.description: This IE indicates the associated Victim gNB Set ID of the cell

elementList.name: Supported MBS FSA ID List
elementList.description: Shall contain all MBS Frequency Selection Area Identities associated with the NR CGI.

elementList.name: RedCap Broadcast Information
elementList.description: The presence of this IE indicates that the intraFreqReselectionRedCap IE is broadcast in SIB1 of the corresponding cell, see TS 38.331 [8]. Each position in the bitmap indicates which RedCap UEs are allowed access, according to the setting of RedCap barring indicators in SIB1, see TS 38.331 [8]. First bit = 1Rx, second bit = 2Rx, third bit = halfDuplex, other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'access allowed'. Value '0' indicates 'access not allowed”.

elementList.name: eRedCap Broadcast Information
elementList.description: The presence of this IE indicates that the intraFreqReselection-eRedCap IE is broadcast in SIB1 of the corresponding cell, see TS 38.331 [8]. Each position in the bitmap indicates which eRedCap UEs are allowed access, according to the setting of the barring indicators in SIB1, see TS 38.331 [8]. First bit = 1Rx, second bit = 2Rx, third bit=half-duplex, other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'access allowed'. Value '0' indicates 'access not allowed”.

elementList.name: XR Broadcast Information
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the cellBarred2RxXR contained in the SIB1 message as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Barring Exemption for Emergency Call Information
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the barringExemptEmergencyCall contained in the SIB1 message as defined in 38.331 [10].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.
Maximum no. of Extended Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.
Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in an NR cell. Value is 12.
Maximum no. NR-U Channel IDs in a cell. Value is 16.
Maximum no. of MBS FSAs by a cell. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Transmission Action Indicator
descriptionList: This IE indicates actions for the gNB-DU for the data transmission to the UE.

definitionList.name: NR CGI
descriptionList: The NR Cell Global Identifier (NR CGI) is used to globally identify a cell.

definitionList.name: Time To wait
descriptionList: This IE defines the minimum allowed waiting times.

definitionList.name: PLMN Identity
descriptionList: This information element indicates the PLMN Identity.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: - digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n -The PLMN identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either -a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or -3 digits from MNC (in case of a 3 digit MNC).

definitionList.name: Transmission Bandwidth
descriptionList: The Transmission Bandwidth IE is used to indicate the UL or DL transmission bandwidth.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, ..., scs480, scs960)
elementList.description: The values scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, scs480 and scs960 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17].

elementList.name: NRB
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (nrb11, nrb18, nrb24, nrb25, nrb31, nrb32, nrb38, nrb51, nrb52, nrb65, nrb66, nrb78, nrb79, nrb93, nrb106, nrb107, nrb121, nrb132, nrb133, nrb135, nrb160, nrb162, nrb189, nrb216, nrb217, nrb245, nrb264, nrb270, nrb273, ..., nrb33, nrb62, nrb124, nrb148, nrb248, nrb44, nrb58, nrb92, nrb119, nrb188, nrb242, nrb15)
elementList.description: This IE is used to indicate the UL or DL transmission bandwidth expressed in units of resource blocks "NRB" (TS 38.104 [17]). The values nrb11, nrb18, etc. correspond to the number of resource blocks "NRB" 11, 18, etc.

definitionList.name: NR Frequency Info
descriptionList: The NR Frequency Info defines the carrier frequency used in a cell for a given direction (UL or DL) in FDD or for both UL and DL directions in TDD or for an SUL carrier.

elementList.name: NR ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

elementList.name: NR Frequency Band
elementList.description: Operating Band as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.3. The value 1 corresponds to NR operating band n1, value 2 corresponds to NR operating band n2, etc.

elementList.name: Supported SUL band Item
elementList.description: Supplementary NR Operating Band as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.3 that can be used for SUL duplex mode as per TS 38.101-1 [26] table 5.2.-1. The value 80 corresponds to NR operating band n80, value 81 corresponds to NR operating band n81, etc.

elementList.name: Frequency Shift 7p5khz
elementList.description: Indicate whether the value of Δshift is 0kHz or 7.5kHz when calculating FREF,shift as defined in Section 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.104 [17].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.
Maximum no. of frequency bands supported for a NR cell. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU System Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the system information generated by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: MIB message
elementList.description: Includes the MIB message, as defined in subclause 6.2.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB1 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB1 message, as defined in subclause 6.2.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB12 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB12 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB13 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB13 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB14 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB14 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB10 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB10 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB17 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB17 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: SIB20 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB20 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: SIB15 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB15 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB24 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB24 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB22 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB22 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB23 message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB23 IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SIB17bis message
elementList.description: Includes the SIB17bis IE, as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: E-UTRAN QoS
descriptionList: This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a DRB or to a BH RLC channel for EN-DC case.

elementList.name: QCI
elementList.description: QoS Class Identifier defined in TS 23.401 [10]. Logical range and coding specified in TS 23.203 [11]. For a BH RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget included in QCI defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the gNB-DU and its child IAB-MT.

elementList.name: GBR QoS Information
elementList.description: This IE shall be present for GBR bearers only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: ENB DL Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: DL Transport Layer Address of node terminating PDCP. Included for MN-terminated SCG bearers.

definitionList.name: Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList: This IE specifies the relative importance compared to other E-RABs for allocation and retention of the E-UTRAN Radio Access Bearer.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE should be understood as "priority of allocation and retention" (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: Value 15 means "no priority". Values between 1 and 14 are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e. 1 is the highest and 14 the lowest. Value 0 shall be treated as a logical error if received.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other E-RABs (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: The E-RAB shall not pre-empt other E-RABs or, the E-RAB may pre-empt other E-RABs The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for an E-RAB and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the E-RAB to pre-emption of other E-RABs (see TS 23.401 [10]). Usage: The E-RAB shall not be pre-empted by other E-RABs or the E-RAB may be pre-empted by other RABs. Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the E-RAB, unless modified, and as such indicates whether the E-RAB is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the maximum and guaranteed bit rates of a GBR E-RAB for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [10].

definitionList.name: Bit Rate
descriptionList: This IE indicates the number of bits delivered by NG-RAN in UL or to NG-RAN in DL within a period of time, divided by the duration of the period. It is used, for example, to indicate the maximum or guaranteed bit rate for a GBR QoS flow, or an aggregated maximum bit rate.

elementList.name: Bit Rate
elementList.description: The unit is: bit/s

definitionList.name: Transaction ID
descriptionList: The Transaction ID IE uniquely identifies a procedure among all ongoing parallel procedures of the same type initiated by the same protocol peer. Messages belonging to the same procedure use the same Transaction ID. The Transaction ID is determined by the initiating peer of a procedure.

NOTE:	If F1-C signalling transport is shared among multiple interface instances, the Transaction ID is allocated so that it can be associated with an F1-C interface instance. The Transaction ID may identify more than one interface instance.

definitionList.name: DRX Cycle
descriptionList: The DRX Cycle IE is to indicate the desired DRX cycle.

elementList.name: Long DRX Cycle Length
elementList.description: Corresponds to the drx-LongCycle which is the length of the drx-LongCycleStartOffset contained in the DRX-Config IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Short DRX Cycle Length
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms2, ms3, ms4, ms5, ms6, ms7, ms8, ms10, ms14, ms16, ms20, ms30, ms32, ms35, ms40, ms64, ms80, ms128, ms160, ms256, ms320, ms512, ms640, ...)
elementList.description: Corresponds to the drx-ShortCycle contained in the DRX-Config IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Short DRX Cycle Timer
elementList.description: Corresponds to the drx-ShortCycleTimer contained in the DRX-Config IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: CU to DU RRC Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the RRC Information that are sent from gNB-CU to gNB-DU.

elementList.name: CG-ConfigInfo
elementList.description: Includes the CG-ConfigInfo message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: UE-CapabilityRAT-ContainerList
elementList.description: This IE is used in the NG-RAN and it includes the UE-CapabilityRAT-ContainerList IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MeasConfig
elementList.description: Includes the MeasConfig IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8] (without the MeasGapConfig IE). For EN-DC/NGEN-DC operation, includes the list of FR2 frequencies for which the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to generate gaps. For NG-RAN, NE-DC and MN for NR-NR DC, includes the list of FR1 and/or FR2 frequencies, for which the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to generate gaps and the gap type (per-UE or per-FR).

elementList.name: Handover Preparation Information
elementList.description: Includes the HandoverPreparationInformation message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CellGroupConfig
elementList.description: Includes the CellGroupConfig IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Measurement Timing Configuration
elementList.description: Contains the MeasurementTimingConfiguration inter-node message defined in TS 38.331 [8]. In EN-DC/NGEN-DC, it is included when the gaps for FR2 are requested to be configured by the MeNB. For MN in NR-NR DC,it is included when the gaps for FR2 and/or FR1 are requested by the SgNB

elementList.name: UEAssistanceInformation
elementList.description: Includes the UEAssistanceInformation message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: CG-Config
elementList.description: Includes the CG-Config message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: UEAssistanceInformationEUTRA
elementList.description: Includes the UEAssistanceInformation message, as defined in TS 36.331 [41].

elementList.name: Location Measurement Information
elementList.description: Includes the LocationMeasurementInfo IE, as defined in TS 38.331[8]

elementList.name: MUSIM-GapConfig
elementList.description: Includes the MUSIM-GapConfig IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SDT-MAC-PHY-CG-Config
elementList.description: Includes the SDT-MAC-PHY-CG-Config IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MBSInterestIndication
elementList.description: Includes the MBSInterestIndication message as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: NeedForGapsInfoNR
elementList.description: Includes the NeedForGapsInfoNR IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: NeedForGapNCSG-InfoNR
elementList.description: Includes the NeedForGapNCSG-InfoNR IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: NeedForGapNCSG-InfoEUTRA
elementList.description: Includes the NeedForGapNCSG-InfoEUTRA IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: ConfigRestrictInfoDAPS
elementList.description: Includes the ConfigRestrictInfoDAPS-r16 IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used at the source node if DAPS HO is configured.

elementList.name: NeedForInterruptionInfoNR
elementList.description: Includes the NeedForInterruptionInfoNR IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: musim-CapabilityRestrictionIndication
elementList.description: Corresponds to the musim-CapRestrictionInd contained in the RRCSetupComplete message or the RRCResumeComplete message as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: musim-CandidateBandList
elementList.description: Includes the musim-CandidateBandList contained in the OtherConfig IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: DU to CU RRC Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the RRC Information that are sent from the gNB-DU to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: CellGroupConfig
elementList.description: Includes the CellGroupConfig IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MeasGapConfig
elementList.description: Includes the MeasGapConfig IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For EN-DC/NGEN-DC operation, includes the gap for FR2, as requested by the gNB-CU via MeasConfig IE. For NG-RAN, NE-DC and MN for NR-NR DC, includes the gap(s) for FR1 and/or FR2, as requested by the gNB-CU via MeasConfig IE. For pre-configured measurement GAP scenario, it includes the gapToAddModList and/or gapToReleaseList as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Requested P-MaxFR1
elementList.description: Includes the requestedP-MaxFR1 contained in the CG-Config message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For EN-DC, NGEN-DC and NR-DC operation, this IE should be included.

elementList.name: DRX Long Cycle Start Offset
elementList.description: Corresponds to the drx-LongCycleStartOffset IE contained in the DRX-Config IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This field is not used in NR-DC.

elementList.name: Selected BandCombinationIndex
elementList.description: Includes the BandCombinationIndex IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For (NG)EN-DC and NR DC operation, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the selected Band Combination; if this IE is included, the gNB-CU uses this information to deduce the selected band.

elementList.name: Selected FeatureSetEntryIndex
elementList.description: Includes the FeatureSetEntryIndex IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For (NG)EN-DC and NR DC operation, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the selected FeatureSet.

elementList.name: Ph-InfoSCG
elementList.description: Includes the PH-TypeListSCG IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].For MR-DC, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the Power Headroom type for each serving cell in SN.

elementList.name: Requested BandCombinationIndex
elementList.description: Includes the BandCombinationIndex IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used for the gNB-DU to request a new Band Combination.

elementList.name: Requested FeatureSetEntryIndex
elementList.description: Includes the FeatureSetEntryIndex IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used for the gNB-DU to request a new Feature Set.

elementList.name: DRX Config
elementList.description: Includes the DRX-Config IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This field is only used in NR-DC.

elementList.name: PDCCH BlindDetectionSCG
elementList.description: Includes the pdcch-BlindDetectionSCG contained in the CG-ConfigInfo message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used between the MgNB-DU and the MgNB-CU.

elementList.name: Requested PDCCH BlindDetectionSCG
elementList.description: Includes the requestedPDCCH-BlindDetectionSCG contained in the CG-Config message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used between the SgNB-DU and the SgNB-CU.

elementList.name: Ph-InfoMCG
elementList.description: Includes the PH-TypeListMCG IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For MR-DC, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the Power Headroom type for each serving cell in MCG.

elementList.name: MeasGapSharingConfig
elementList.description: Includes the MeasGapSharingConfig IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config
elementList.description: Includes the SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config-r16 IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SL-ConfigDedicatedEUTRA-Info
elementList.description: Includes the SL-ConfigDedicatedEUTRA-Info IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Requested P-MaxFR2
elementList.description: Includes the requestedP-MaxFR2 contained in the CG-Config message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For NR-DC operation, this IE should be included.

elementList.name: SDT-MAC-PHY-CG-Config
elementList.description: Includes the SDT-MAC-PHY-CG-Config IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: MUSIM-GapConfig
elementList.description: Includes the MUSIM-GapConfig IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: SL-RLC-ChannelToAddModList
elementList.description: Includes the sl-RLC-ChannelToAddModList-r17 contained in the SL-ConfigDedicatedNR IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: InterFrequencyConfig-NoGap
elementList.description: Corresponds to the interFrequencyConfig-NoGap-r16 contained in the MeasConfig IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: ul-GapFR2-Config
elementList.description: Includes the ul-GapFR2-Config contained in the RRCReconfiguration message, as specifed in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: TwoPHRModeMCG
elementList.description: Corresponds to the twoPHRModeMCG contained in the CG-ConfigInfo message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For NR-DC, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the two PHR mode in the MN.

elementList.name: TwoPHRModeSCG
elementList.description: Corresponds to the twoPHRModeSCG contained in the CG-Config message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. For NR-DC, this IE should be included so that gNB-CU is informed of the two PHR mode in the SN.

elementList.name: ncd-SSB-RedCapInitialBWP-SDT
elementList.description: Includes the NonCellDefiningSSB contained in the RRCRelease message, as specified in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: ServCellInfoList
elementList.description: Includes the ServCellInfoListSCG-NR IE or the ServCellInfoListMCG-NR IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. This IE is used for inter-node message for MN and SN in case of split gNB architecture.

elementList.name: Extended SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config
elementList.description: Includes the SL-PHY-MAC-RLC-Config-v1700 IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. If this IE is present, the SL-RLC-ChannelToAddModList IE is ignored.

definitionList.name: RLC Mode
descriptionList: The RLC Mode IE indicates the RLC Mode used for a DRB or a BH RLC channel, or a Uu Relay RLC channel, or a PC5 Relay RLC channel.

definitionList.name: SUL Information
descriptionList: This IE provides information about the SUL carrier.

elementList.name: SUL ARFCN
elementList.description: RF Reference Frequency as defined in TS 38.104 [17] section 5.4.2.1. The frequency provided in this IE identifies the absolute frequency position of the reference resource block (Common RB 0) of the SUL carrier. Its lowest subcarrier is also known as Point A.

elementList.name: Carrier List
elementList.description: If included, the SUL Transmission Bandwidth IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: Frequency Shift 7p5khz
elementList.description: Indicate whether the value of Δshift is 0kHz or 7.5kHz when calculating FREF,shift as defined in Section 5.4.2.1 of TS 38.104 [17].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

definitionList.name: 5GS TAC
descriptionList: This information element is used to identify Tracking Area Code.

definitionList.name: Configured EPS TAC
descriptionList: This information element is used to identify a configured EPS Tracking Area Code in order to enable application of Roaming and Access Restrictions for EN-DC as specified in TS 37.340 [7]. This IE is configured for the cell, but not broadcast.

definitionList.name: RRC Reconfiguration Complete Indicator
descriptionList: This IE indicates the result of the reconfiguration performed towards the UE.

definitionList.name: UL Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates how the UL scheduling is configured at gNB-DU.

elementList.name: UL UE Configuration
elementList.description: Indicates how the UE uses the UL at gNB-DU, for which "no-data" indicates that the UL scheduling is not performed at gNB-DU, "shared" indicates that the UL scheduling is performed at both gNB-DU and another node, and "only" indicates that the UL scheduling is only performed at the gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: C-RNTI
descriptionList: This IE contains the C-RNTI information.

elementList.name: C-RNTI
elementList.description: C-RNTI as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Cell UL Configured
descriptionList: This IE indicates whether the gNB-CU requests the gNB-DU to configure the uplink as no UL, UL, SUL or UL+SUL for the indicated cell for the UE.

elementList.name: Cell UL Configured
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (none, UL, SUL, UL and SUL, ...)
elementList.description: Further details are defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: RAT-Frequency Priority Information
descriptionList: The RAT-Frequency Priority Information contains either the Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority IE or the Index to RAT/Frequency Selection Priority IE. These parameters are used to define local configuration for RRM strategies.

elementList.name: Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority

definitionList.name: LCID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a LCID for the associated SRB or DRB.

elementList.name: LCID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the LogicalChannelIdentity defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Duplication Activation
descriptionList: The Duplication Activation IE indicates whether UL PDCP Duplication is activated or not.

definitionList.name: Slice Support List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of supported slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: S-NSSAI
descriptionList: This IE indicates the S-NSSAI as defined in TS 23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: UE Identity Index value
descriptionList: This IE is used by the gNB-DU to calculate the Paging Frame.

elementList.name: Index Length 10
elementList.description: Coded as specified in TS 38.304 [24].

definitionList.name: Paging DRX
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Paging DRX as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: Paging DRX
elementList.description: Unit in radio frame.

definitionList.name: Paging Priority
descriptionList: This IE indicates the paging priority for paging a UE.

elementList.name: Paging Priority
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (PrioLevel1, PrioLevel2, PrioLevel3, PrioLevel4, PrioLevel5, PrioLevel6, PrioLevel7, PrioLevel8, ...)
elementList.description: Lower value codepoint indicates higher priority.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU System Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the system information encoded by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: SIB type to Be Updated List
SIB type to Be Updated Item IEs
SIB type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SIB block, e.g. 2 means sibType2, 3 for sibType3, etc. Values for SIBs generated by the gNB-DU as defined subclause 5.2.2 in TS 38.470 [2], values 6, 7, 8 and values corresponding to not defined SIBs in TS 38.331 [8] are not applicable in this version of the specifications.

elementList.name: SIB message
elementList.description: SIB as defined in subclause 6.3.1 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: areaScope
elementList.description: Indicates that a SIB is area specific. If the field is not present, the SIB is cell specific.

elementList.name: SystemInformationAreaID
elementList.description: Indicates the system information area that the cell belongs to, if any.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SIB types, the maximum value is 32.

definitionList.name: RAN UE Paging identity
descriptionList: This IE indicates the RAN UE Paging identity.

definitionList.name: CN UE Paging Identity
descriptionList: The 5G-S-TMSI is used as UE identifier for CN paging.

elementList.name: 5G-S-TMSI
elementList.description: Details defined in TS 38.413 [3]

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters
descriptionList: This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a QoS flow, or to a DRB, or to a BH RLC channel, or to a Uu Relay RLC channel, or to a PC5 Relay RLC channel, or to a MRB.

NOTE:	For a BH RLC channel, the listed mandatory IEs and the GBR QoS Flow Information IE are applicable, where GBR QoS Flow Information IE may be present if BH RLC channel conveys the traffic belonging to a GBR QoS Flow.

elementList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
elementList.description: This IE shall be present for GBR QoS Flows only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Reflective QoS Attribute
elementList.description: Details in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE applies to non-GBR flows only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: PDU Session ID
elementList.description: As specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: UL PDU Session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: The PDU session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate Uplink which is associated with the involved PDU session.

elementList.name: QoS Monitoring Request
elementList.description: Indicates to measure UL, or DL, or both UL/DL delays for the associated QoS flow or stop the corresponding QoS monitoring.

elementList.name: PDCP Terminating Node DL Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: DL Transport Layer Address of node terminating PDCP. Included for MN-terminated SCG bearers and SN-terminated MCG bearers.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates QoS parameters for a GBR QoS flow or GBR bearer for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver) in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver). Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the downlink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the uplink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
elementList.description: Indicates alternative sets of QoS Parameters for the QoS flow.

definitionList.name: Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics for a Non-standardised or not pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. For IAB, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the IAB-DU/IAB-donor-DU and its child IAB-MT, or between the IAB-DU and its served UE. For a PC5 Relay RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the L2 U2N relay UE and L2 U2N remote UE. For a Uu Relay RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the gNB-DU and L2 U2N relay UE. This IE is ignored if the Extended Packet Delay Budget IE is present.

elementList.name: Packet Error Rate
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the dynamically assigned 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Delay Critical
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. This IE shall be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to "delay critical" and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Downlink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Uplink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the GBR QoS Flow Information IE is present in the QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters IE.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList: This IE specifies the relative importance of a QoS flow or a DRB compared to other QoS flows or DRBs for allocation and retention of NG-RAN resources.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE defines the relative importance of a resource request (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: Values are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e., with 1 as the highest priority and 15 as the lowest priority. Further usage is defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other QoS flows (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: The QoS flow shall not pre-empt other QoS flows or, the QoS flow may pre-empt other QoS flows. Note: The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for a QoS flow and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the gNB.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the QoS flow to pre-emption of other QoS flows (see TS 23.501 [21]). Usage: The QoS flow shall not be pre-empted by other QoS flows or the QoS flow may be pre-empted by other QoS flows. Note: The Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the QoS flow, unless modified and as such indicates whether the QoS flow is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of thegNB.

definitionList.name: Non Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics for a standardized or pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the standardized or pre-configured 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [21]. For a BH RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget included in 5QI defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the gNB-DU and its child IAB-MT.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Downlink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Uplink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Maximum Packet Loss Rate.

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate
elementList.description: Ratio of lost packets per number of packets sent, expressed in tenth of percent.

definitionList.name: Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.5ms.

definitionList.name: Packet Error Rate
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Error Rate for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Scalar
elementList.description: The packet error rate is expressed as Scalar x 10-k where k is the Exponent.

definitionList.name: Averaging Window
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Averaging Window for a QoS flow, and applies to GBR QoS Flows only.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: Unit: ms. The default value is 2000ms.

definitionList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Maximum Data Burst Volume for a QoS flow, and applies to delay critical GBR QoS flows only.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: Unit: byte.

definitionList.name: Masked IMEISV
descriptionList: This information element contains the IMEISV value with a mask, to identify a terminal model without identifying an individual Mobile Equipment.

elementList.name: Masked IMEISV
elementList.description: Coded as the International Mobile station Equipment Identity and Software Version Number (IMEISV) defined in TS 23.003 [23] with the last 4 digits of the SNR masked by setting the corresponding bits to 1. The first to fourth bits correspond to the first digit of the IMEISV, the fifth to eighth bits correspond to the second digit of the IMEISV, and so on.

definitionList.name: Notification Control
descriptionList: The Notification Control IE indicates whether the notification control for a given DRB is active or not-active.

definitionList.name: RAN Area Code
descriptionList: This information element is used to uniquely identify a RAN Area Code.

elementList.name: RANAC
elementList.description: RAN Area Code

definitionList.name: PWS System Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the system information used for public warning.

elementList.name: SIB type
elementList.description: Indicates a certain SIB block for public warning message, e.g. 6 means sibType6, 7 for sibType7, etc.

elementList.name: SIB message
elementList.description: SIB message for public warning, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Additional SIB Message List
elementList.description: Additional SIB messages containing different segments of a public warning message if segmentation is applied, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Repetition Period
descriptionList: This IE indicates the periodicity of the warning message to be broadcast.

elementList.name: Repetition Period
elementList.description: The unit of value 1 to 217-1 is [second].

definitionList.name: Number of Broadcasts Requested
descriptionList: This IE indicates the number of times a message is to be broadcast.

definitionList.name: SIType List
descriptionList: This IE is used by the gNB-CU to indicate to the gNB-DU to broadcast one or several SystemInformation messages including the Other SI.

elementList.name: SI Type
elementList.description: Value “1” corresponds to the SI message identified by the first SI message indicated in the SI-SchedulingInfo IE in the SIB1 message, value "2" to the SI message identified by the second SI message indicated in the SI-SchedulingInfo IE in the SIB1 message, and so on, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SI types, the maximum value is 32.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Identifier
descriptionList: This IE identifies a QoS Flow within a PDU Session, a MBS QoS flow within a MBS session. The definition and use of the QoS Flow Identifieris specified in TS 23.501 [21].

definitionList.name: Served E-UTRA Cell Information
descriptionList: This IE contains served cell information of an E-UTRA cell for spectrum sharing between E-UTRA and NR.

elementList.name: UL Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier for UL.

elementList.name: DL Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier for DL.

elementList.name: Offset to Point A
elementList.description: Indicates the offset to the center of the NR carrier.

elementList.name: Protected E-UTRA Resource Indication
elementList.description: Indicates the Protected E-UTRA Resource Indication as defined in subclause 9.2.125 of TS 36.423 [9].

definitionList.name: Available PLMN List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of available PLMN.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.

definitionList.name: RLC Failure Indication
descriptionList: This IE indicates the LCID associated with the RLC entity needing re-establishment.

definitionList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentList Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the Uplink TxDirectCurrentList information that is configured by the UE.

elementList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentList Information
elementList.description: Includes the UplinkTxDirectCurrentList IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Service Status
descriptionList: This IE is used to indicate the service status of a cell by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Service State
elementList.description: Indicates the Service State of the cell. In-Service and Out-of-Service Service States are defined in TS 38.401 [4].

elementList.name: Switching Off Ongoing
elementList.description: This IE indicates that the gNB-DU will delete the cell after some time using a new gNB-DU Configuration Update procedure.

definitionList.name: RLC Status
descriptionList: This IE indicates about the RLC configuration change included in the container towards the UE.

elementList.name: Reestablishment Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that following a change in the radio status, the RLC has been re-established.

definitionList.name: RRC Version
descriptionList: This information element is used to identify RRC version corresponding to TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Latest RRC Version
elementList.description: This IE is not used in this release.

elementList.name: Latest RRC Version Enhanced
elementList.description: Latest supported RRC version in the release corresponding to TS 38.331 [8]. For a 3GPP specification version x.y.z, x is encoded by the leftmost byte, y by the middle byte, and z by the rightmost byte. If the RRC protocol is not supported in the gNB-DU, this IE is set to all ‘0’s.

definitionList.name: RRC Delivery Status
descriptionList: This IE provides information about the delivery status of RRC messages to the UE.

elementList.name: Delivery Status
elementList.description: Highest NR PDCP SN successfully delivered in sequence to the UE.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.description: NR PDCP SN for the RRC message that triggered the report.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
descriptionList: This IE is used to indicate only the uplink or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB.

elementList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that only the uplink or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB

definitionList.name: Resource Coordination Transfer Information
descriptionList: This IE contains information for UE-associated E-UTRA – NR resource coordination.

elementList.name: MeNB Cell ID
elementList.description: E-UTRAN Cell Identifier IE contained in the ECGI as defined in TS 36.423 [9] clause 9.2.14

definitionList.name: E-UTRA PRACH Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates the PRACH resources used in E-UTRA cell.

elementList.name: RootSequenceIndex
elementList.description: See section 5.7.2. in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: ZeroCorrelationZoneConfiguration
elementList.description: See section 5.7.2. in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: HighSpeedFlag
elementList.description: TRUE corresponds to Restricted set and FALSE to Unrestricted set. See section 5.7.2 in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: PRACH-FrequencyOffset
elementList.description: See section 5.7.1 of TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: PRACH-ConfigurationIndex
elementList.description: See section 5.7.1. in TS 36.211 [27]

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the EUTRA-Mode-Info IE in the Resource Coordination E-UTRA Cell Information IE is set to the value "TDD".

definitionList.name: Resource Coordination E-UTRA Cell Information
descriptionList: This IE contains E-UTRA cell information for UE-associated E-UTRA – NR resource coordination.

elementList.name: UL EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) is defined in TS 36.104 [25].

elementList.name: DL EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) is defined in TS 36.104 [25].

elementList.name: UL Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.description: Present if UL EARFCN IE is present.

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) is defined in TS 36.104 [25].

elementList.name: Subframe Assignment
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(sa0, sa1, sa2, sa3, sa4, sa5, sa6,…)
elementList.description: Uplink-downlink subframe configuration information defined in TS 36.211 [27]. In NB-IOT, sa0 and sa6 are not applicable.

elementList.name: Special Subframe Info
elementList.description: Special subframe configuration information defined in TS 36.211 [27]

elementList.name: Special Subframe Patterns
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(ssp0, ssp1, ssp2, ssp3, ssp4, ssp5, ssp6, ssp7, ssp8, ssp9, ssp10, …)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum value of extended EARFCN. Value is 262143.

definitionList.name: Extended Available PLMN List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of available PLMN.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Extended Broadcast PLMN Ids. Value is 6.

definitionList.name: Associated SCell List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of SCells associated with the RLC entity indicated by the RLC Failure Indication IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SCells allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 32.

definitionList.name: Cell Direction
descriptionList: This IE indicates if the cell is either bidirectional or only DL or only UL.

definitionList.name: Paging Origin
descriptionList: This IE indicates whether Paging is originated due to the PDU sessions from the non-3GPP access.

definitionList.name: E-UTRA Transmission Bandwidth
descriptionList: This IE is used to indicate the E-UTRA UL or DL transmission bandwidth expressed in units of resource blocks " NRB " (TS 36.104 [25]). The values bw1, bw6, bw15, bw25, bw50, bw75, bw100 correspond to the number of resource blocks "NRB" 6, 15, 25, 50, 75, 100.

elementList.name: E-UTRA Transmission Bandwidth
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (bw6, bw15, bw25, bw50, bw75, bw100,... )

definitionList.name: Message Identifier
descriptionList: This IE identifies the warning message.

elementList.name: Message Identifier
elementList.description: This IE is set by the 5GC, transferred to the UE by the gNB node.

definitionList.name: Serial Number
descriptionList: This IE identifies a particular message from the source and type indicated by the Message Identifier and is altered every time the message with a given Message Identifier is changed.

definitionList.name: UAC Assistance Information
descriptionList: This information element contains assistance information helping the gNB-DU to set parameters for Unified Access Class barring.

elementList.name: Access Category
elementList.description: Indicates the operator defined Access Category as defined in subclause 6.3.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Access Identity
elementList.description: Indicates whether access attempt is allowed for each Access Identity as defined in subclause 6.3.2 in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of UAC PLMN Ids. Value is 12.
Maximum no. of signalled categories per PLMN. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: UAC Action
descriptionList: This IE indicates which signalling traffic is expected to be reduced by the gNB-CU, as defined in clause 8.7.7 of TS 38.413 [3]

elementList.name: UAC Action
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Reject RRC connection establishments for non-emergency MO DT, Reject RRC connection establishments for Signalling, Permit Emergency Sessions and mobile terminated services only, Permit High Priority Sessions and mobile terminated services only,…)

definitionList.name: UAC reduction Indication
descriptionList: This IE indicates the percentage of signalling traffic expected to be reduced by the gNB-CU, relative to the instantaneous incoming rate from the gNB-DU

elementList.name: UAC reduction Indication
elementList.description: Value 0 indicates that no access rate reduction is desired. In this version of specification, value 99 indicates the highest desired rate reduction.

definitionList.name: Additional SIB Message List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of additional SIB messages containing all the remaining segments of a public warning message if segmentation is applied to such message.

elementList.name: Additional SIB Message List Item IEs
Additional SIB
elementList.description: SIB message containing one segment of a public warning message, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of additional segments of a public warning message. Value is 63.

definitionList.name: Cell Type
descriptionList: This IE provides the cell coverage area.

definitionList.name: Configured TAC Indication
descriptionList: This IE indicates that the TAC with which this IE is associated, is only configured for the cell, but not broadcast.
NOTE:	This IE is defined in accordance to the possibility foreseen in TS 38.331 [8] to not broadcast the TAC if the NR cell only supports PSCell/SCell functionality.

definitionList.name: Trace Activation
descriptionList: This IE defines parameters related to a trace session activation.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: This IE is composed of the following: Trace Reference defined in TS 32.422 [29] (leftmost 6 octets, with PLMN information encoded as in 9.3.1.14), and Trace Recording Session Reference defined in TS 32.422 [29] (last 2 octets).

elementList.name: Interfaces To Trace
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an NG-RAN node interface: first bit = NG-C, second bit = Xn-C, third bit = Uu, fourth bit = F1-C, fifth bit = E1: other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'should be traced'. Value '0' indicates 'should not be traced'.

elementList.name: Trace Depth
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (minimum, medium, maximum, minimumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, mediumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, maximumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, …)
elementList.description: Defined in TS 32.422 [29].

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: For File based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [29]. Should be ignored if URI is present.
