elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity URI
elementList.description: For Streaming based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [29] Replaces Trace Collection Entity IP Address if present

definitionList.name: Intended TDD DL-UL Configuration
descriptionList: This IE contains the subcarrier spacing, cyclic prefix and TDD DL-UL slot configuration of an NR cell that the receiving gNB needs to take into account for cross-link interference mitigation, and/or for NR-DC power coordination, when operating its own cells.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, …, scs 480, scs960)
elementList.description: The values scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, scs480 and scs960 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17].

elementList.name: NR Cyclic Prefix
elementList.description: The type of cyclic prefix, which determines the number of symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: NR DL-UL Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0p5, ms0p625, ms1, ms1p25, ms2, ms2p5, ms3, ms4, ms5, ms10, ms20, ms40, ms60, ms80, ms100, ms120, ms140, ms160, …)
elementList.description: The periodicity is expressed in the format msXpYZ, and equals X.YZ milliseconds.

elementList.name: All DL
elementList.description: This choice implies that all symbols in the slot are DL symbols.

elementList.name: All UL
elementList.description: This choice implies that all symbols in the slot are UL symbols.

elementList.name: Number of DL Symbols
elementList.description: Number of consecutive DL symbols in the slot identified by Slot Index IE. If extended cyclic prefix is used, the maximum value is 11. The Permutation IE indicates the location of DL symbols in the slot.

elementList.name: Number of UL Symbols
elementList.description: Number of consecutive UL symbols in the slot identified by Slot Index IE. If extended cyclic prefix is used, the maximum value is 11. The Permutation IE indicates the location of UL symbols in the slot.

elementList.name: Permutation
elementList.description: If not present, the default value is DFU.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum length of number of slots in a 10-ms period. Value is 5120.

definitionList.name: Additional RRM Policy Index
descriptionList: The Additional RRM Policy Index IE is used to provide additional information independent from the Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority as specified in TS 36.300 [20].

definitionList.name: DU-CU RIM Information
descriptionList: This IE conveys the Remote Interference Management message from the gNB-DU to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: RIM-RS Detection Status
elementList.description: This IE indicates detection status of RIM-RS in gNB-DU

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.

definitionList.name: CU-DU RIM Information
descriptionList: This IE conveys the Remote Interference Management message from the gNB-CU to the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: RIM-RS Detection Status
elementList.description: This IE indicates detection status of RIM-RS in remote gNB(s).

definitionList.name: gNB Set ID
descriptionList: The gNB Set ID IE is used to identify a group of gNBs which transmit the same RIM-RS.

definitionList.name: Lower Layer Presence Status Change
descriptionList: This IE indicates lower layer resources’ presence status shall be changed.

elementList.name: Lower Layer Presence Status Change
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (suspend lower layers, resume lower layers ...)
elementList.description: "suspend lower layers" will store CellGroupConfig. From the parameters received within the ReconfigurationWithSync, only the sPCellConfigCommon is stored. "resume lower layers" shall restore SCG and it is set only after "suspend lower layers" has been indicated.

definitionList.name: Traffic Mapping Information
descriptionList: This IE includes the information used by the gNB-DU to perform traffic mapping.

elementList.name: IP to layer2 Traffic Mapping Info
IP to layer2 Traffic Mapping Info To Add
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of IP traffic to layer-2 to be added.

elementList.name: IP to layer2 Traffic Mapping Info To Remove
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of IP traffic to layer 2 to be removed.

elementList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel Mapping Info
BAP layer BH RLC channel Mapping Info To Add
elementList.reference: BAP layer BH RLC channel mapping Information List 9.3.1.98
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of traffic on BAP layer to be added.

elementList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel Mapping Info To Remove
elementList.description: This IE indicates the mapping information for forwarding of traffic on BAP layer to be removed.

definitionList.name: IP-to-layer-2 traffic mapping Information List
descriptionList: This IE includes the information used by the IAB-donor-DU to perform the mapping from IP layer to layer-2. If this IE appears in the UE-associated F1AP signalling, the BH Information IE should only contain the BAP Routing ID IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of mapping entries, the maximum value is 67108864 (i.e. 2^26).

definitionList.name: IP Header Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the IP header information included in the Traffic Mapping Information IE for DL traffic.

elementList.name: Destination IAB TNL Address
elementList.description: This IE indicates the destination IPv4 address, or IPv6 address or IPv6 prefix of a DL packet.

elementList.name: DSCP
elementList.description: This IE indicates the DS information of DL traffic.

elementList.name: IPv6 Flow Label
elementList.description: This IE indicates the IPv6 Flow Label of DL traffic.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of DSCP values related to a destination IP address that can be mapped to one BH RLC channel, the maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel mapping Information List
descriptionList: This IE includes the information used by the IAB-DU to perform the BH RLC channel mapping when forwarding traffic on BAP sublayer.

When this IE is included in the UE-associated F1AP signalling for setting up or modifying a BH RLC channel, it contains either the Prior-Hop BAP Address IE and the Ingress BH RLC CH ID IE to configure a mapping in downlink direction, or the Next-Hop BAP address IE and the Egress BH RLC CH ID IE to configure a mapping in uplink direction. This IE indicates the BH RLC channel served by the collocated IAB-MT.

When this IE is included in the non-UE-associated F1AP signalling, it shall contain the Prior-Hop BAP Address IE, the Ingress BH RLC CH ID IE, the Next-Hop BAP address IE and the Egress BH RLC CH ID IE.

elementList.name: BAP layer BH RLC channel mapping info Item
Ingress Non-F1-terminating IAB-donor Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the ingress topology for this entry is the non-F1-terminating IAB-donor topology of the boundary IAB-node.

elementList.name: Egress Non-F1-terminating IAB-donor Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the egress topology for this entry is the non-F1-terminating IAB-donor topology of the boundary IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of mapping entries, the maximum value is 67108864 (i.e. 2^26).

definitionList.name: Mapping Information to Remove
descriptionList: This IE includes a list of mapping information indexes corresponding to the mapping configuration which is to be removed.

elementList.name: Mapping Information to Remove List Item

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of mapping entries, the maximum value is 67108864 (i.e. 2^26).

definitionList.name: Mapping Information Index
descriptionList: This IE includes an index of one mapping information entry at the IAB-donor-DU or an IAB-DU.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL Addresses Requested
descriptionList: The IAB TNL Addresses Requested IE indicates the number of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses or IPv6 address prefixes requested for the indicated usage.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - All Traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/ IPv6 prefixes requested for all traffic.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - F1-C traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/IPv6 prefixes requested for F1-C traffic.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - F1-U traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/ IPv6 prefixes requested for F1-U traffic.

elementList.name: TNL Addresses or Prefixes Requested - Non-F1 traffic
elementList.description: The number of TNL addresses/ IPv6 prefixes requested for non-F1 traffic.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL Address
descriptionList: The IAB TNL Address IE indicates an IPv4 or IPv6 address or an IPv6 address prefix assigned to an IAB-node.

elementList.name: IPv4 Address
elementList.description: The IPv4 address allocated to an IAB-node.

elementList.name: IPv6 Address
elementList.description: The IPv6 address allocated to an IAB-node.

elementList.name: IPv6 Prefix
elementList.description: The IPv6 address prefix allocated to an IAB-node.

definitionList.name: Uplink BH Non-UP Traffic Mapping
descriptionList: This IE indicates the mapping of uplink non-UP traffic to a BH RLC channel and BAP Routing ID.

elementList.name: Uplink Non-UP Traffic Mapping List Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of non-UP traffic mappings. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: Non-UP Traffic Type
descriptionList: This IE indicates the type of non-UP traffic.

elementList.name: Non-UP Traffic Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(UE-associated F1AP, non-UE-associated F1AP, non-F1, BAP control PDU, ...)

definitionList.name: IAB Info IAB-donor-CU
descriptionList: This IE contains cell-specific IAB-related information sent by an IAB-donor-CU to an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: IAB STC Info
elementList.description: Contains STC configuration of IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

definitionList.name: IAB Info IAB-DU
descriptionList: This IE contains cell-specific IAB-related information sent by an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU to an IAB-donor-CU.

elementList.name: Multiplexing Info
elementList.description: Contains the information about multiplexing with cells configured for a collocated IAB-MT. Applicable for an IAB-DU.

elementList.name: IAB STC Info
elementList.description: Contains the information about STC configuration of IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU Cell Resource Configuration
descriptionList: This IE contains the resource configuration of the cells served by a gNB-DU, i.e. the TDD/FDD resource parameters for each activated cell (TS 38.213 [31], clause 11.1.1).

elementList.name: Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (kHz15, kHz30, kHz60, kHz120, kHz240, spare3, spare2, spare1, …)
elementList.description: Subcarrier spacing used as reference for the TDD/FDD slot configuration.

elementList.name: DUF Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0p5, ms0p625, ms1, ms1p25, ms2, ms2p5, ms5, ms10, …)

elementList.name: DUF Slot Configuration Item
elementList.description: The maxNrofSlots in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: DUF Slot Format Index
elementList.description: Index into Table 11.1.1-1 and Table 14-2 in TS 38.213 [31], excluding the last row in Table 14-2.

elementList.name: HSNA Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0p5, ms0p625, ms1, ms1p25, ms2, ms2p5, ms5, ms10, ms20, ms40, ms80, ms160, …)

elementList.name: HSNA Downlink
elementList.description: HSNA value for downlink symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: HSNA Uplink
elementList.description: HSNA value for uplink symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: HSNA Flexible
elementList.description: HSNA value for flexible symbols in a slot.

elementList.name: RB Set Index
elementList.description: Refers to an RB set defined by RB Set Configuration. The RB set indices are consecutive (and increasing) starting at 0.

elementList.name: Slot Index
elementList.description: Indicates an index to a slot within the HSNA Transmission Periodicity.

elementList.name: HSNA Downlink
elementList.description: HSNA value for downlink symbols in a slot, for an RB set.

elementList.name: HSNA Uplink
elementList.description: HSNA value for uplink symbols in a slot, for an RB set.

elementList.name: HSNA Flexible
elementList.description: HSNA value for flexible symbols in a slot, for an RB set.

elementList.name: Child IAB-Nodes NA Resource List
elementList.description: List of child IAB-nodes served by the IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: Child IAB-Nodes NA Resource List Item
gNB-CU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at the IAB-donor-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID
elementList.description: Identifier of a child-node IAB-MT at an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: NA Resource Configuration List
elementList.description: List of not-available resources of this cell for this child IAB-node

elementList.name: NA Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates whether downlink symbols, in a slot, are available to serve the child IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates whether uplink symbols, in a slot, are available to serve the child IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Flexible
elementList.description: Indicates whether flexible symbols, in a slot, are available to serve the child IAB-node.

elementList.name: Parent IAB Nodes NA Resource Configuration List
elementList.description: List of unavailable resources of this cell for this IAB-node.

elementList.name: Parent IAB Nodes NA Resource Configuration Item
NA Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates whether downlink symbols, in a slot, are unavailable to serve the IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates whether uplink symbols, in a slot, are unavailable to serve the IAB-node.

elementList.name: NA Flexible
elementList.description: Indicates whether flexible symbols, in a slot, are unavailable to serve the IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of slots in 10ms. Value is 320.
Maximum no of "Hard", "Soft" or "Not available" slots in 160ms. Value is 5120.
Maximum no. of RB sets per IAB-DU cell. Value is 8
Maximum no. of RB sets per IAB-DU cell minus 1. Value is 7
Maximum number of child nodes served by an IAB-DU or an IAB-donor-DU. Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: Multiplexing Info
descriptionList: This IE contains information about the multiplexing capabilities between the gNB-DU’s cell and the cells configured on the co-located IAB-MT.

elementList.name: NR Cell Identity
elementList.description: Cell identity of a serving cell configured for a co-located IAB-MT.

elementList.name: DU_RX/MT_RX
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous reception at its DU and MT side.

elementList.name: DU_TX/MT_TX
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous transmission at its DU and MT side.

elementList.name: DU_RX/MT_TX
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous reception at its DU and transmission at its MT side.

elementList.name: DU_TX/MT_RX
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous transmission at its DU and reception at its MT side.

elementList.name: DU_RX/MT_RX_extend
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous reception at its DU and MT side. If present, the DU_RX/MT_RX IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DU_TX/MT_TX_extend
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous transmission at its DU and MT side. If present, the DU_TX/MT_TX IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DU_RX/MT_TX_extend
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous reception at its DU and transmission at its MT side. If present, the DU_RX/MT_TX IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: DU_TX/MT_RX_extend
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (supported, not supported, supported and FDM required)
elementList.description: An indication of whether the IAB-node supports simultaneous transmission at its DU and reception at its MT side. If present, the DU_TX/MT_RX IE shall be ignored.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of serving cells for IAB-MT. Value is 32, as defined by the maxNrofServingCells in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: IAB STC Info
descriptionList: This IE contains cell SSB Transmission Configuration (STC) information of an IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU. The information is used by neighbour IAB-MTs for discovery and measurements of this IAB-DU or IAB-donor-DU.

elementList.name: SSB Frequency Info
elementList.description: The SSB central frequency.

elementList.name: SSB Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (kHz15, kHz30, kHz120, kHz240, spare3, spare2, spare1, …)
elementList.description: The SSB subcarrier spacing.

elementList.name: SSB Transmission Periodicity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (sf10, sf20, sf40, sf80, sf160, sf320, sf640, ..., sf5)

elementList.name: SSB Transmission Timing Offset
elementList.description: SSB transmission timing offset in number of half-frames.

elementList.name: CHOICE SSB Transmission Bitmap
elementList.description: The SSB-ToMeasure IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of STC configurations. Value is 5. This includes 1 STC configuration for access and 4 STC configurations for backhaul.
Maximum value of NR ARFCNs. Value is 3279165.

definitionList.name: BAP Routing ID
descriptionList: This IE indicates the BAP Routing ID.

definitionList.name: BAP Address
descriptionList: This IE indicates the BAP address of an IAB-node or of an IAB-donor-DU, and it is part of the BAP Routing ID.

elementList.name: BAP Address
elementList.description: Corresponds to the bap-Address contained in the RRCReconfiguration message or contained in the BAP-RoutingID IE, or the iab-donor-DU-BAP-Address contained in the RRCReconfiguration message defined TS 38.331[8].

definitionList.name: BAP Path ID
descriptionList: This IE indicates the BAP path ID, which is part of the BAP Routing ID.

elementList.name: BAP Path ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the bap-Pathid contained in the BAP-RoutingID IE defined in subclause 6.3.2 of TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: BH RLC Channel ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a BH RLC channel in the link between IAB-MT of the IAB-node and IAB-DU of the parent IAB-node or IAB-donor-DU.

definitionList.name: BH Information
descriptionList: This IE includes the backhaul information for UL or DL.

elementList.name: BAP Routing ID
elementList.description: This IE is not needed for the BAP control PDU. For UL F1-U traffic, the BAP address included in this IE also indicates the IAB-donor-DU via which the DL traffic is transmitted.

elementList.name: Egress BH RLC CH List Item
Next-Hop BAP Address
elementList.description: This IE identifies the next-hop node on the backhaul path to receive the packet. The value of this IE should be unique in the whole list.

elementList.name: Egress BH RLC CH ID
elementList.description: This IE identifies the BH RLC channel in the link between the IAB node/IAB-donor-DU and the node identified by the Next-Hop BAP Address IE.

elementList.name: Non-F1-Terminating IAB-donor Topology Indicator
elementList.description: If present, indicates that the Next-Hop BAP Address and Egress BH RLC CH ID contained in this IE pertain to the non-F1-terminating IAB-donor topology of the boundary IAB-node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of egress links. Value is 2.

definitionList.name: Control Plane Traffic Type
descriptionList: This IE indicates the control plane traffic type carried over a BH RLC channel.

elementList.name: Control Plane Traffic Type
elementList.description: Control plane traffic types with different priorities are identified by the different codepoints in this IE, where 1 has the highest priority.

definitionList.name: NR V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE to use the NR sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE.

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE.

definitionList.name: LTE V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE to use the LTE sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE.

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE.

definitionList.name: LTE UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE’s communication over LTE sidelink.

elementList.name: LTE UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE’s communication over NR sidelink.

elementList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving gNB-DU.

definitionList.name: SL DRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a SL DRB for a UE.

elementList.name: SL DRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the SLRB-Uu-ConfigIndex IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: PC5 QoS Flow Identifier
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies one sidelink QoS flow between the UE and the network in the scope of UE.

elementList.name: PC5 QoS Flow Identifier
elementList.description: Corresponds to the SL-QoS-FlowIdentity IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: PC5 QoS Parameters
descriptionList: This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a SL DRB or to a PC5 Relay RLC channel for L2 U2U relaying.

elementList.name: PC5 QoS Flow Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS Flows.

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.287 [40].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.287 [40].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of PC5 QoS flows allowed towards one UE for NR sidelink communication, the maximum value is 2048.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Index
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS parameters set which can currently be fulfilled.

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Index
elementList.description: Indicates the index of the item within the Alternative QoS Parameters Set List IE corresponding to the currently fulfilled alternative QoS parameters set.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Notify Index
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS parameters set which can currently be fulfilled.

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Notify Index
elementList.description: Indicates the index of the item within the the Alternative QoS Parameters Set List IE corresponding to the currently fulfilled alternative QoS parameters set. Value 0 indicates that NG-RAN cannot even fulfil the lowest alternative parameter set.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
descriptionList: This IE contains alternative sets of QoS parameters which the gNB can indicate to be fulfilled when notification control is enabled and it cannot fulfil the requested list of QoS parameters.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: Maximum Data Burst Volume is specified in TS 23.501 [21]. This IE is included if the Delay Critical IE is set to “delay critical” and is ignored otherwise.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of alternative sets of QoS Parameters allowed for the QoS profile. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Non Dynamic PQI Descriptor
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics for a standardized or pre-configured PQI for sidelink.

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the standardized or pre-configured PQI as specified in TS 23.287 [40]

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

definitionList.name: Dynamic PQI Descriptor
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics for a Non-standardised or not pre-configured PQI for sidelink.

elementList.name: QoS Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. For a PC5 Relay RLC channel, the Packet Delay Budget defines the upper bound for the time that a packet may be delayed between the L2 U2U Relay UE and L2 U2U Remote UE.

elementList.name: Packet Error Rate
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [21]. This IE shall be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to "delay critical" and is ignored otherwise.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the PC5 QoS Flow Bit Rates IE is present in the PC5 QoS parameters IE.

definitionList.name: TNL Capacity Indicator
descriptionList: The TNL Capacity Indicator IE indicates the offered and available capacity of the Transport Network experienced by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: DL TNL Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the transport portion of the gNB-DU – gNB-CU in kbps

elementList.name: DL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity over the transport portion serving the node in percentage. Value 100 corresponds to the offered capacity

elementList.name: UL TNL Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the transport portion of the gNB-DU – gNB-CU in kbps

elementList.name: UL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity over the transport portion serving the node in percentage. Value 100 corresponds to the offered capacity

definitionList.name: Radio Resource Status
descriptionList: The Radio Resource Status IE indicates the usage of the PRBs per cell for MIMO, per SSB area and per slice for all traffic in Downlink and Uplink and the usage of PDCCH CCEs for Downlink and Uplink scheduling.

elementList.name: SSB Area Radio Resource Status List
SSB Area Radio Resource Status Item
SSB Area DL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL GBR PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: SSB Area UL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL GBR PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: SSB Area DL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL non-GBR PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: SSB Area UL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL non-GBR PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: SSB Area DL Total PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL Total PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: SSB Area UL Total PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL Total PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN

elementList.name: S-NSSAI DL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice DL GBR PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: S-NSSAI UL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice UL GBR PRB usage for this slice in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: S-NSSAI DL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice DL non-GBR PRB usage for this slice in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: S-NSSAI UL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per slice UL non-GBR PRB usage for this slice in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: Slice DL Total PRB allocation
elementList.description: Total amount of DL PRBs available per cell for this slice if all the resources the slice could access were usable.

elementList.name: Slice UL Total PRB allocation
elementList.description: Total amount of UL PRBs available per cell for this slice if all the resources the slice could access were usable.

elementList.name: DL GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell DL GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: UL GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell UL GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: DL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell DL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: UL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell UL non-GBR PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: DL Total PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell DL Total PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: UL Total PRB usage for MIMO
elementList.description: Per cell UL Total PRB usage for MIMO in percentage of the cell total PRB number as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a cell. Value is 64.
Maximum no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 1024.
Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in a cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Composite Available Capacity Group
descriptionList: The Composite Available Capacity Group IE indicates the overall available resource level per cell and per SSB area in the cell in Downlink and Uplink.

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Downlink
elementList.description: For the Downlink

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Uplink
elementList.description: For the Uplink, including both NUL and SUL (if available)

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Supplementary Uplink
elementList.description: For the SUL

definitionList.name: Composite Available Capacity
descriptionList: The Composite Available Capacity IE indicates the overall available resource level in the cell in either Downlink or Uplink.

elementList.name: Capacity Value
elementList.description: ‘0’ indicates no resource is available, Measured on a linear scale.

definitionList.name: Cell Capacity Class Value
descriptionList: The Cell Capacity Class Value IE indicates the value that classifies the cell capacity with regards to the other cells. The Cell Capacity Class Value IE only indicates resources that are configured for traffic purposes.

elementList.name: Capacity Class Value
elementList.description: Value 1 shall indicate the minimum cell capacity, and 100 shall indicate the maximum cell capacity. There should be a linear relation between cell capacity and Cell Capacity Class Value.

definitionList.name: Capacity Value
descriptionList: The Capacity Value IE indicates the amount of resources per cell and per SSB area that are available relative to the total gNB-DU resources. The capacity value should be measured and reported so that the minimum gNB-DU resource usage of existing services is reserved according to implementation. The Capacity Value IE can be weighted according to the ratio of cell capacity class values, if available.

elementList.name: Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity with respect to the whole cell. Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

elementList.name: SSB Area Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . SSB Area Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Slice Available Capacity
descriptionList: The Slice Available Capacity IE indicates the amount of resources per network slice that are available per cell relative to the total gNB-DU resources per cell. The Slice Available Capacity Value Downlink IE and the Slice Available Capacity Value Uplink IE can be weighted according to the ratio of the corresponding cell capacity class values contained in the Composite Available Capacity Group IE, if available.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMN

elementList.name: Slice Available Capacity Value Downlink
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . Slice Available Capacity Value Downlink should be measured on a linear scale.

elementList.name: Slice Available Capacity Value Uplink
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . Slice Available Capacity Value Uplink should be measured on a linear scale.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 1024.
Maximum no. of PLMN Ids.broadcast in a cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Number of Active UEs
descriptionList: The Number of Active UEs IE indicates the mean number of active UEs as defined in TS 38.314 [32].

elementList.name: Mean number of Active UEs
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.314 [32] and where value "1" is equivalent to 0.1 Active UEs, value "2" is equivalent to 0.2 Active UEs, value n is equivalent to n/10 Active UEs.

definitionList.name: Hardware Load Indicator
descriptionList: The Hardware Load Indicator IE indicates the status of the Hardware Load.

elementList.name: DL Hardware Load Indicator
elementList.description: This indicates the load in percent

elementList.name: UL Hardware Load Indicator
elementList.description: This indicates the load in percent

definitionList.name: NR Carrier List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the SCS-specific carriers per TDD, per DL, per UL or per SUL of an NR cell.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, …, scs480, scs960)
elementList.description: SCS for the corresponding carrier.

elementList.name: Offset to Carrier
elementList.description: Offset in frequency domain between Point A (lowest subcarrier of common RB 0) and the lowest usable subcarrier on this carrier in number of PRBs (using the NR SCS IE defined for this carrier). The maximum value corresponds to 275×8−1. See TS 38.211 [33], clause 4.4.2.

elementList.name: Carrier Bandwidth
elementList.description: Width of this carrier in number of PRBs (using the NR SCS IE defined for this carrier). See TS 38.211 [33], clause 4.4.2.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SCS-specific carriers per TDD, per DL, per UL or per SUL of an NR cell. Value is 5.
Maximum no. of Physical Resource Blocks. Value is 275.

definitionList.name: SSB Positions In Burst
descriptionList: Indicates the time domain positions of the transmitted SS-blocks in a half frame with SS/PBCH blocks as defined in TS 38.213 [31], clause 4.1.

elementList.name: CHOICE ssb-PositionsInBurst
elementList.description: The first/ leftmost bit corresponds to SS/PBCH block index 0, the second bit corresponds to SS/PBCH block index 1, and so on. Value 0 in the bitmap indicates that the corresponding SS/PBCH block is not transmitted while value 1 indicates that the corresponding SS/PBCH block is transmitted.

definitionList.name: NR PRACH Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates the PRACH resources by a NR cell.

definitionList.name: NR PRACH Configuration List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the PRACH resources used or reserved in the UL carrier(s) or SUL carrier(s) of the current NR cell.

elementList.name: NR PRACH Configuration Item
elementList.description: Length=0 means releasing of all NR PRACH Configuration Items for this UL or SUL.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, …, scs 480, scs960)
elementList.description: The SCS of the carrier to which this PRACH Configuration Item relates, i.e. in Section 5.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33]. The values scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, scs 480, and scs960 corresponds to the sub carrier spacing in TS 38.104 [17]. NOTE: Its value may not be identical to the SCS of PRACH.

elementList.name: PRACH Frequency Start from Carrier
elementList.description: Lowest number of resource blocks which can be used to deliver MSG1 or the preamble part of MSGA, counting from the start number of the corresponding carrier. Identical to in Section 5.1.2.2.2 in TS 38.214 [34] plus msg1-FrequencyStart or msgA-RO-FrequencyStart-r16 in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: PRACH-FDM
elementList.description: in Section 6.3.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: PRACH Configuration Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: SSB per RACH Occasion
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (oneEighth, oneFourth, oneHalf, one, two, four, eight, sixteen, ...)
elementList.description: Number of SSBs per RACH occasion. Value oneEight corresponds to one SSB associated with 8 RACH occasions, value oneFourth corresponds to one SSB associated with 4 RACH occasions, and so on.

elementList.name: CHOICE FreqDomainLength
elementList.description: For the case of PRACH resources reserved for BFR or MSG1-based SI Request, L139 is always used.

elementList.name: Root Sequence Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Restricted Set Config
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: PRACH SCS
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (scs15, scs30, scs60, scs120, …, scs480, scs960)
elementList.description: Subcarrier Spacing of PRACH, i.e. in Section 5.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Root Sequence Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: PRACH SCS for L571
elementList.description: Subcarrier Spacing of PRACH, i.e. in Section 5.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Root Sequence Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: PRACH SCS for L1151
elementList.description: Subcarrier Spacing of PRACH, i.e. in Section 5.3.2 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Root Sequence Index
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

elementList.name: Zero Correlation Zone Config
elementList.description: See Section 6.3.3.1 in TS 38.211 [33].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Physical Resource Blocks minus 1. Value is 274.
Maximum no. of PRACH Configuration. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: TSC Traffic Characteristics
descriptionList: This IE provides the traffic characteristics of TSC QoS flows.

definitionList.name: TSC Assistance Information
descriptionList: This IE provides the TSC assistance information for a TSC QoS flow in the uplink or downlink (see TS 23.501 [21]).

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Burst Arrival Time as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: N6 Jitter Information
elementList.description: Indicates the jitter information associated with the Periodicity in downlink, as defined in TS 23.501[21].

definitionList.name: Periodicity
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Periodicity as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity expressed in units of 1 us.

definitionList.name: Burst Arrival Time
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Burst Arrival Time as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Encoded in the same format as the ReferenceTime IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8]. The value is provided with 1 us accuracy.

definitionList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.01ms.

definitionList.name: RLC Duplication Information
descriptionList: The IE contains the RLC duplication information in case that the indicated DRB is configured with more than two RLC entities as specified in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: RLC Duplication State Items
elementList.description: Each position in the list represents a secondary RLC entity in ascending order by the logical channel ID in the order of MCG and SCG.

elementList.name: Primary Path Indication
elementList.description: Indicates whether the primary path is located at the gNB-DU for DC based PDCP duplication.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of Secondary RLC entities. Value is 3.

definitionList.name: Reporting Request Type
descriptionList: This IE indicates the type of accurate reference time information reporting to be handled by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Report Periodicity Value
elementList.description: Indicates the periodicity of accurate reference time information report, Unit in radio frame.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Event Type IE is set to "periodic".

definitionList.name: Time Reference Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the time reference information.

elementList.name: Reference SFN
elementList.description: Corresponds to the referenceSFN contained in the ReferenceTimeInfo IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: Uncertainty
elementList.description: Corresponds to the uncertainty contained in the ReferenceTimeInfo IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Time Information Type
elementList.description: Corresponds to the timeInfoType contained in the ReferenceTimeInfo IE, as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Reference Time
descriptionList: This IE provides the accurate Reference Time information.

elementList.name: Reference Time
elementList.description: Includes the ReferenceTime IE contained in the ReferenceTimeInfo IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: MDT Configuration
descriptionList: The IE defines the MDT configuration parameters.

elementList.name: MDT Activation
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(Immediate MDT only, Immediate MDT and Trace, …)

elementList.name: Measurements to Activate
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates a MDT measurement, as defined in TS 37.320 [35]. Second Bit = M2, Fifth Bit = M5, Seventh Bit = M6, Eighth Bit = M7. Value "1" indicates "activate" and value "0" indicates "do not activate". This version of the specification does not use bits 1, bit 3, bit 4 and bit 6.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the second bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the fifth bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the seventh bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the eighth bit set to "1".

definitionList.name: MDT PLMN List
descriptionList: The purpose of the MDT PLMN List IE is to provide the list of PLMN allowed for MDT.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of PLMNs in the MDT PLMN list. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: M5 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M5 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M5 Report Amount
elementList.description: Number of reports.

definitionList.name: M6 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M6 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M6 Report Interval
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms120, ms240, ms640, ms1024, ms2048, ms5120, ms10240, ms20480, ms40960, min1,min6, min12, min30,…, ms480)

elementList.name: M6 Report Amount
elementList.description: Number of reports.

definitionList.name: M7 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M7 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M7 Collection Period
elementList.description: Unit: minutes

elementList.name: M7 Report Amount
elementList.description: Number of reports.

definitionList.name: NID
descriptionList: This IE is used to identify (together with a PLMN identifier) a Stand-alone Non-Public Network. The NID is specified in TS 23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: NPN Support Information
descriptionList: This IE contains NPN related information associated with Network Slicing information.

definitionList.name: NPN Broadcast Information
descriptionList: This IE contains NPN related broadcast information.

elementList.name: CHOICE NPN Broadcast Information per PLMN

definitionList.name: Broadcast SNPN ID List
descriptionList: This IE contains SNPN related broadcast information associated with a set of PLMNs.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of NIDs broadcast in a cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Broadcast CAG-Identifier List
descriptionList: This IE contains a list of CAG-Identifiers.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of CAG-Identifiers broadcast in a cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: CAG ID
descriptionList: This IE is used to identify (together with a PLMN identifier) a Public Network Integrated NPN, as defined in TS 23.003 [23].

elementList.name: CAG ID
elementList.description: Closed Access Group ID used in NR.

definitionList.name: Broadcast PNI-NPN ID Information
descriptionList: This IE contains a list of PNI-NPN IDs.

elementList.name: Broadcast PNI-NPN ID Information
elementList.description: Broadcast PLMNs

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of broadcast PLMNs by a cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Available SNPN ID List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of available SNPN ID.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of NIDs broadcast in a cell. Value is 12.

definitionList.name: Extended Slice Support List
descriptionList: This IE indicates a list of supported slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: Positioning Measurement Result
descriptionList: The purpose of this information element is to provide the measurement result(s).

elementList.name: Aggregated Positioning SRS Resource ID List
elementList.description: Indicates the used Positioning SRS resources across aggregated carriers.

elementList.name: Aggregated Positioning SRS Resource ID Item
Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(kHz15, kHz30, kHz60, kHz120,…, kHz480, kHz960)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 16384.
Maximum no of aggregated SRS resources per UL BWP. Value is 3.

definitionList.name: UL Angle of Arrival
descriptionList: This information element contains the uplink Angle of Arrival measurement.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Access Point Position
descriptionList: This IE is used to identify the geographical position of an NG-RAN Access Point / TRP / TRP Antenna Reference Points. It is expressed as ellipsoid point with altitude and uncertainty ellipsoid according to TS 23.032 [36].

elementList.name: Degrees Of Latitude
elementList.description: The IE value (N) is derived by this formula: N223 X /90  N+1 X being the latitude in degrees (0°.. 90°).

elementList.name: Degrees Of Longitude
elementList.description: The IE value (N) is derived by this formula: N224 X /360  N+1 X being the longitude in degrees (-180°..+180°).

elementList.name: Altitude
elementList.description: The relation between the value (N) and the altitude (a) in meters it describes is N a < N+1, except for N=215-1 for which the range is extended to include all greater values of (a).

elementList.name: Uncertainty semi-major
elementList.description: The uncertainty "r" is derived from the "uncertainty code" k by r = 10x(1.1k-1).

elementList.name: Uncertainty semi-minor
elementList.description: The uncertainty "r" is derived from the "uncertainty code" k by r = 10x(1.1k-1).

elementList.name: Uncertainty Altitude
elementList.description: The uncertainty altitude "h" expressed in metres is derived from the "uncertainty code" k, by: h=45x(1.025k-1).

elementList.name: Confidence
elementList.description: In percentage

elementList.description: Indicates when the SRS is expected to arrive in time at the TRP relative to the UL RTOA Reference Time. The UL RTOA Reference Time for a target SRS is defined as , where - is the SFN Initialisation Time - , where and are the system frame number and the subframe number of the SRS, respectively. Granularity 4Ts, where Ts=1/(15103 2048) seconds. Centre of the search window.

elementList.name: Delay Uncertainty
elementList.description: Indicates the uncertainty of the expected SRS arrival time at the TRP Granularity 4Ts, where Ts=1/(151032048) seconds. Single-sided search window.

elementList.description: Time offset in microseconds between the absolute time reference "1980-01-06 T00:00:19 International Atomic Time (TAI)” and the SFN0 start. The maximum usable value is (1024*10^4-1). Values higher than the maximum are discarded.

definitionList.name: F1-C Transfer Path NRDC
descriptionList: This IE indicates the transmission path of the F1-C traffic in NR-DC. This IE is only applicable if the UE is an IAB-MT.

elementList.name: F1-C Path NRDC
elementList.description: This IE indicates the transmission path of the F1-C traffic in NR-DC.

definitionList.name: IAB TNL Address Exception
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of TNL addresses, pertaining to the packets to be forwarded via the inter-IAB-donor-DU tunnel by the IAB-donor-DU.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of individual IPv4/IPv6 addresses or IPv6 address prefixes in one procedure execution. The value is 1024.

definitionList.name: RB Set Configuration
descriptionList: This IE contains the RB Set Configuration. The IE is only applicable if the gNB-DU is an IAB-DU.

elementList.name: Subcarrier Spacing
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (kHz15, kHz30, kHz60, kHz120, kHz240, spare3, spare2, spare1, …)
elementList.description: Subcarrier spacing used as reference for the RB set configuration.

elementList.name: RB Set Size
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (rb2, rb4, rb8, rb16, rb32, rb64)
elementList.description: Number of PRBs in each RB set. If the RB sets of IAB-DU H/S/NA resource configuration do not cover the entire carrier bandwidth, the remaining RBs not part of an RB set configuration are considered as included in the last RB set.

elementList.name: Number of RB Sets
elementList.description: Number of configured RB sets. The RB sets are contiguous and non-overlapping. If NR Carrier List IE(9.3.1.137) is provided, the start RB index of the first RB set is the RB index of the lowest common RB with the SCS provided by RB Set Configuration IE, which overlaps with the lowest usable RB across all SCS-specific carriers provided by the NR Carrier List IE for the IAB-DU cell. Otherwise, the start RB of the first RB set is aligned with point A for the IAB-DU cell.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of RB sets per IAB-DU cell. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Survival Time
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Survival Time of the TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Survival Time
elementList.description: Expressed in units of 1 us.

definitionList.name: PDC Measurement Result
descriptionList: The purpose of this IE is to provide the PDC measurement result.

elementList.name: NR PDC Timing Advance
elementList.description: Value is expressed in unit of [64*] ns

elementList.name: PDC gNB Rx-Tx Time Difference
elementList.description: Report mapping as defined in TS 38.133 [38]

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of measured quantities that can be configured and reported with one message. Value is 16. Maximum is 1 in this release.

definitionList.name: SCG Activation Request
descriptionList: This IE indicates whether the SCG resources are required to be activated or deactivated.

definitionList.name: SCG Activation Status
descriptionList: This IE indicates the status of SCG resources.

definitionList.name: Requested DL PRS Transmission Characteristics
descriptionList: This IE contains the requested PRS configuration for transmission by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Resource Set Periodicity
elementList.description: Slots

elementList.name: Resource Set Start Time and Duration
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Start Time and Duration IE is present

elementList.name: PRS Bandwidth Aggregation Request Information List

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Start Time and Duration
descriptionList: This IE contains the start time and/or duration for the on-demand DL-PRS.

elementList.name: Duration
elementList.description: Unit: seconds

definitionList.name: PRS Transmission Off Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the information to turn off particular PRS transmissions.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources set. Value is 8.
Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: UL-AoA Assistance Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the expected uplink Angle of Arrival and uncertainty range.

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA
elementList.description: Defined as (φAOA - ΔφAOA/2, φAOA + ΔφAOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA Value
elementList.description: φAOA component of Expected Azimuth AoA

elementList.name: Expected Azimuth AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔφAOA component of Expected Azimuth AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA
elementList.description: Defined as (θZOA – ΔθZOA/2, θZOA + ΔθZOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Value
elementList.description: θZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔθZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected UL Angle of Arrival Zenith Only
elementList.description: Defined as (θZOA – ΔθZOA/2, θZOA + ΔθZOA/2)

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Value
elementList.description: θZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: Expected Zenith AoA Uncertainty Range
elementList.description: ΔθZOA component of Expected Zenith AoA

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: If absent, the azimuth and zenith are provided in GCS. In case of zenith only, the z-axis of LCS is defined along the linear array axis.

definitionList.name: Zenith Angle of Arrival Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the Zenith Angle of Arrival, which can correspond to linear array measurement.

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: If absent, the zenith is provided in GCS. the z-axis of LCS is defined along the linear array axis

definitionList.name: On-demand PRS TRP Information
descriptionList: This IE contains on-demand PRS information for the TRP.

elementList.name: On-demand PRS Request Allowed
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an on-demand PRS transmission parameter: first bit: Resource Set Periodicity second bit: PRS Bandwidth third bit: Resource Repetition Factor fourth bit: Resource Number of Symbols fifth bit: Comb Size sixth bit: Number of Frequency Layers seventh bit: Start Time and Duration eighth bit: Off Indication ninth bit: QCL Information tenth bit: PRS Bandwidth Aggregation Other bits reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Set Periodicity Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the first bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Set Periodicity IE defined in subclause 9.2.235, first bit = 4 and so on. Bit 24 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Set Periodicity values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed PRS Bandwidth Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the second bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the PRS Bandwidth IE defined in subclause 9.3.1.235, first bit = 1 and so on. Bit 64 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all PRS Bandwidth values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Repetition Factor Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the third bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Repetition Factor IE defined in subclause 9.3.1.235, first bit = rf1 and so on. Bit 8 is reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Repetition Factor values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Resource Number of Symbols Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the fourth bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Resource Number of Symbols IE defined in subclause 9.3.1.235, first bit = n2 and so on. Bits 6-8 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Resource Number of Symbols values are allowed to be requested.

elementList.name: Allowed Comb Size Values
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the fifth bit of the On-demand PRS Request Allowed IE is set to ‘1’. Each position in the bitmap represents a value of the Comb Size IE defined in subclause 9.3.1.235, first bit = 2 and so on. Bits 5-8 are reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘request allowed’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘request not allowed’. If this IE is absent, all Comb Size values are allowed to be requested.

definitionList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
descriptionList: This IE contains the LCS to GCS Translation information.

definitionList.name: Response Time
descriptionList: This information element contains the response time of the measurement results reporting.

definitionList.name: ARP Location Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the relative position of ARP(s) to the TRP.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of ARPs associated with a TRP. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: ARP ID
descriptionList: This IE is used to uniquely identify an ARP associated with a TRP.

definitionList.name: Multiple UL AoA
descriptionList: This information element contains the list of the multiple UL AOAs values.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of UL-AOAs values (pair of AOA & ZOA values) that can be reported. Value is 8

definitionList.name: UL SRS-RSRPP
descriptionList: This information element contains the UL SRS RSRPP measurement.

definitionList.name: SRS Resource type
descriptionList: This IE contains the SRS resource type.

elementList.name: SRS Port Index
elementList.description: This IE may be present if the SRS Resource ID IE is present, and is ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: Extended Additional Path List
descriptionList: This IE contains the extended additional path results of time measurement.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of additional path measurement. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: LoS/NLoS Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the LoS/NLoS information for UL measurement.

elementList.name: LoS/NLoS Indicator Soft
elementList.description: Values provide the likelihood of a LOS propagation path in the range between 0 and 1 with 0.1 steps resolution. Value '0' indicates NLOS and value '1' indicates LOS.

definitionList.name: Requested DL-PRS Resource List
descriptionList: This IE contains the requested DL-PRS resource list.

elementList.name: Requested DL-PRS Resource List
elementList.description: NR-DL-PRS-Resource-r16 as defined in TS 37.355 [39]

elementList.name: QCL Source PRS Resource Set ID

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of PRS resources per PRS resource set. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP Tx TEG Association
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP Tx TEG information.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no of reported TRP Tx TEG association. Value is 8.
Maximum no of DL-PRS resources of the DL-PRS resource set of the TRP. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRP TEG Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP TEG information.

definitionList.name: Measurement Characteristics Request Indicator
descriptionList: This IE contains the measurement characteristic information requested by the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Measurement characteristic request indicator
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a requested measurement characteristic: first bit: Measurement Beam Information Second bit: Extended Additional Path List Third bit: Additional Path Power Fourth Bit: Multiple UL AoA of Additional Path Fifth bit: LoS/NLoS Information Sixth bit: TRP Rx TEG association for UL-TDOA Seventh bit: TRP RxTxTEG-ID information for DL+UL positioning. Eighth bit: SRS Resource Type Ninth bit: Multiple Measurement Instances Tenth bit: Mobile TRP location information Eleventh bit: SRS bandwidth aggregation used for joint UL positioning measurement. Twelfth bit: Aggregated Positioning SRS resources IDs used for joint UL positioning measurement. Other bits reserved for future use. Value ‘1’ indicates ‘requested measurement characteristic’, Value ‘0’ indicates ‘not requested’.

definitionList.name: UE Reporting Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the UE Reporting Information.

elementList.name: Reporting Amount
elementList.description: Value 0 represents an infinite number of periodic reporting

elementList.name: Reporting Interval
elementList.description: Unit: seconds This IE is ignored when the ReportingIntervalIMs IE is present.

elementList.name: Reporting IntervalIMs
elementList.description: Indicates the interval between location information reports and the response time requirement for the first location information report in milliseconds. Unit: milliseconds.

definitionList.name: TRP Beam Antenna Information
descriptionList: The IE provides the beam antenna information of the TRP. It includes either the explicit beam antenna information, or a reference to another TRP’s signalled configuration, or the indication that no change has occurred with respect to previously signalled configuration.

elementList.name: CHOICE TRP Beam Antenna Info Item
Associated TRP ID
elementList.description: This IE specifies the TRP ID of the associated TRP from which the beam information parameters are adopted in Local Coordinate System (LCS).

elementList.name: LCS to GCS Translation
elementList.description: Included if the azimuth and elevation are not provided in GCS.

elementList.name: No Change
elementList.description: No change compared to previously signalled configuration for this TRP.

definitionList.name: TRP Beam Antenna Angles
descriptionList: The IE provides the beam antenna information of the TRP.

elementList.name: TRP Azimuth Angle
elementList.description: For GCS, the azimuth angle is measured counter-clockwise from geographical North. For LCS, the azimuth angle is measured counter-clockwise from the x-axis of the LCS.

elementList.name: TRP Azimuth Angle fine
elementList.description: Fine angle

elementList.name: TRP Elevation Angle
elementList.description: For GCS, the elevation angle is measured relative to zenith and positive to the horizontal direction (elevation 0 deg. points to zenith, 90 deg to the horizon). For LCS, the elevation angle is measured relative to the z-axis of the LCS (elevation 0 deg. points to the z-axis, 90 deg to the x-y plane).

elementList.name: TRP Elevation Angle fine
elementList.description: Fine angle

elementList.name: TRP Beam Power List
elementList.description: Relative power between DL-PRS Resources for the given Azimuth and Elevation Angle. The first Relative Power element in this list provides the peak power for this Azimuth/Elevation angle and is defined as 0dB power. All the remaining Relative Power Element's in this list provide the relative DL-PRS Resource power relative to this first element in the list.

elementList.name: PRS Resource Set ID
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource Set ID of the DL-PRS Resource for which the Relative Power is provided. If this field is absent, the DL-PRS Resource Set ID for this instance of the Beam Power List is the same as the DL-PRS Resource Set ID of the previous instance in the Beam Power List. This field shall be included at least in the first instance of the Beam Power List.

elementList.name: PRS Resource ID
elementList.description: DL-PRS Resource for which the Relative Power is provided.

elementList.name: TRP Beam Relative Power
elementList.description: The power values span from -30 to 0dB

elementList.name: TRP Beam Relative Power "fine"
elementList.description: Relative Power with 0.1dB resolution. The power spans from -0.9 to 0dB

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of DL-PRS Resources per angle per TRP. Value is 24.
Maximum number of azimuth angles per TRP. Value is 3600.
Maximum number of elevation angles per azimuth angle/TRP. Value is 1801.

definitionList.name: NR Paging eDRX Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NR Paging eDRX parameters for RRC_IDLE as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: NR Paging eDRX Cycle Idle
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(hfquarter, hfhalf, hf1, hf2, hf4, hf8, hf16, hf32, hf64, hf128, hf256, hf512, hf1024, …)
elementList.description: TeDRX,CN defined in TS 38.304 [24]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

elementList.name: NR Paging Time Window
elementList.description: Unit: [1.28 second].

definitionList.name: NR Paging eDRX Information for RRC INACTIVE
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NR Paging eDRX parameters for RRC_INACTIVE as defined in TS 38.304 [24].

elementList.name: NR Paging eDRX Cycle Inactive
elementList.description: TeDRX,RAN defined in TS 38.304 [24]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

definitionList.name: QoE Metrics

elementList.name: Application Layer Buffer Level List
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.331 [8].

elementList.name: Playout Delay for Media Startup
elementList.description: As defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: CG-SDT Session Info

definitionList.name: SDT Information
descriptionList: This IE is used to indicate an SDT transaction and to provide the assistant information from the UE.

elementList.name: SDT Assistant Information
elementList.description: “single packet” indicates no subsequent SDT transmission is expected. “multiple packets” indicates subsequent SDT transmission is expected.

definitionList.name: Path Switch Configuration
descriptionList: This IE provides information for switching to an indirect path from a direct path or from another indirect path. This IE is also used for only releasing the direct path during MP.

elementList.name: Target Relay UE ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the targetRelayUE-Identity contained in the CellGroupConfig IE, defined in TS 38.331 [8]

elementList.name: T420
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms50, ms100, ms150, ms200, ms500, ms1000, ms2000, ms10000)
elementList.description: Corresponds to the t420 contained in the CellGroupConfig IE, defined in TS 38.331 [8]

definitionList.name: Sidelink Relay Configuration

elementList.name: gNB-DU UE F1AP ID of Relay UE
Sidelink Configuration Container
elementList.description: Includes the SL-ConfigDedicatedNR IE as defined in subclause 6.3.5 in TS 38.331 [8] to carry PC5 Relay RLC channel configuration for Remote UE’s SRB1.

definitionList.name: PC5 RLC Channel ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a PC5 Relay RLC channel for a L2 U2N Remote UE, or a L2 U2N Relay UE, or a L2 U2U Remote UE, or L2 U2U Relay UE.

definitionList.name: Uu RLC Channel ID

elementList.name: Uu RLC Channel ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the Uu-RelayRLC-ChannelID IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Remote UE Local ID

elementList.name: Remote UE Local ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the sl-LocalIdentity contained in the SL-SRAP-Config IE defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: 5G ProSe Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE for NR ProSe services.

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Direct Discovery
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Direct Discovery

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Direct Communication
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Direct Communication

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-Network Relay
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-Network Relay

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-3 UE-to-Network Relay
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-3 UE-to-Network Relay

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 Remote UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-2 Remote UE

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 Multi-path
elementList.description: Indicates whether the 5G ProSe Layer-2 Remote UE is authorized for 5G ProSe multi-path transmission.

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-UE Relay
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-UE Relay UE

elementList.name: 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-UE Remote
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for 5G ProSe Layer-2 UE-to-UE Remote UE.

definitionList.name: PEIPS Assistance Information

elementList.name: RedCap Indication

definitionList.name: gNB-DU UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate List
descriptionList: This IE contains the UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate List as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate Item
UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: This IE indicates the UE-Slice-MBR as specified in TS 23.501 [21] in the uplink direction.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SLICE MAXIMUM BIT RATE values for a UE. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Multicast MBS Session List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Multicast MBS Sessions the UE has joined.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of MBS sessions allowed towards one UE. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: TAI NSAG Support List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of NSAGs configured at the gNB-DU and their associated S-NSSAIs as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: NSAG Slice Support List
elementList.description: Indicates the list of slices which belong to the NSAG.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of signalled NSAGs. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: MDT PLMN Modification List
descriptionList: The purpose of the MDT PLMN List Modification IE is to provide the modified list of PLMN allowed for MDT.

elementList.name: MDT PLMN Modification List
elementList.description: An empty list indicates there is no PLMN allowed for MDT.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of PLMNs in the MDT PLMN list. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: MRB RLC Configuration
descriptionList: This ID provides MRB RLC Configuration Information and is provided by the gNB-DU.

elementList.name: MRB RLC Configuration
elementList.type: ENUMERATED ( rlc-um-ptp, rlc-am-ptp, rlc-um-dl-ptm, two-rlc-um-dl-ptp-and-dl-ptm, three-rlc-um-dl-ptp-ul-ptp-dl-ptm, two-rlc-am-ptp-um-dl-ptm, ...)
elementList.description: The various codepoints correspond to MRB configurations specified in TS 38.300 [6] as follows: "rlc-um-ptp ": Multicast MRB with DL only RLC-UM or bidirectional RLC-UM configuration for PTP transmission; "rlc-am-ptp " Multicast MRB with RLC-AM entity configuration for PTP transmission; " rlc-um-dl-ptm " Multicast MRB with DL only RLC-UM entity for PTM transmission; "two-rlc-um-dl-ptp-and-dl-ptm ": Multicast MRB with two RLC-UM entities, one DL only RLC-UM entity for PTP transmission and the other DL only RLC-UM entity for PTM transmission; "three-rlc-um-dl-ptp-ul-ptp-dl-ptm ": Multicast MRB with three RLC-UM entities, one DL RLC-UM entity and one UL RLC-UM entity for PTP transmission and the other DL only RLC-UM entity for PTM transmission; "two-rlc-am-ptp-um-dl-ptm "; Multicast MRB with two RLC entities, one RLC-AM entity for PTP transmission and the other DL only RLC-UM entity for PTM transmission;

definitionList.name: Timing Error Margin

elementList.name: Timing Error Margin
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(Tc0, Tc2, Tc4, Tc6, Tc8, Tc12, Tc16, Tc20, Tc24, Tc32, Tc40, Tc48, Tc56, Tc64, Tc72, Tc80,…)

definitionList.name: SDT Bearer Configuration Info

definitionList.name: PosSIType List

definitionList.name: IAB-DU Cell Resource Configuration-Mode-Info

elementList.name: Carrier List

definitionList.name: TRP Rx TEG Information

definitionList.name: TRP Tx TEG Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP Tx TEG information.

elementList.name: TRP Tx Timing Error Margin
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP Tx TEG ID.

definitionList.name: TRP RxTx TEG Information
descriptionList: This information element contains the TRP RxTx TEG information.

elementList.name: TRP RxTx Timing Error Margin
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(Tc0dot5, Tc1, Tc2, Tc4, Tc8, Tc12, Tc16, Tc20, Tc24, Tc32, Tc40, Tc48, Tc64, Tc80, Tc96, Tc128, …)
elementList.description: Timing error margin associated to the TRP RxTx TEG ID.

definitionList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentTwoCarrierList Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the Uplink TxDirectCurrentTwoCarrierList information that is configured by the UE.

elementList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentTwoCarrierList Information
elementList.description: Includes the UplinkTxDirectCurrentTwoCarrierList IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentMoreCarrierList Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the Uplink TxDirectCurrentMoreCarrierList information that is configured by the UE.

elementList.name: Uplink TxDirectCurrentMoreCarrierList Information
elementList.description: Includes the UplinkTxDirectCurrentMoreCarrierList IE as defined in TS 38.331 [8].

definitionList.name: Extended UE Identity Index Value
descriptionList: This IE is used by the gNB-DU to calculate the Paging Frame and Paging Occasion for eDRX, and the UE_ID based subgroup ID as specified in TS 38.304 [24].

definitionList.name: Hashed UE Identity Index Value
descriptionList: This IE is the 13 Most Significant Bits (MSBs) of the Hashed ID defined in TS 38.304 [24].

definitionList.name: Broadcast Area Scope
descriptionList: This IE contains the Broadcast Area where the broadcast session is delivered.

elementList.name: Cell ID
elementList.description: Identifier of the cells that establish the broadcast service successfully.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of cells which establish the MRBs successfully in one DU, the maximum value is 512.

definitionList.name: Network Controlled Repeater Authorized

descriptionList: This IE indicates a list of LTM cells to be released.

elementList.name: LTM Cells To Be Released Item IEs

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Cells configured for LTM allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 8.

definitionList.name: Reference Configuration
descriptionList: This IE contains either the request for lower layer reference configuration or the generated lower layer reference configuration used for LTM preparation.

elementList.name: LTM Reference Configuration

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Cells configured LTM allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 8.

definitionList.name: Radio Resource Status NR-U
descriptionList: The Radio Resource Status NR-U IE indicates the usage of the PRBs per NR-U channel for all traffic in Downlink and Uplink.

elementList.name: DL Total PRB Usage
elementList.description: Per NR-U Channel DL Total PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

elementList.name: UL Total PRB Usage
elementList.description: Per NR-U Channel UL Total PRB usage in percentage of the cell total PRB number.

definitionList.name: Path Addition Information
descriptionList: This IE provides information for path addition in case of MP.

elementList.name: Target Relay UE ID
