definitionList.name: Recommended SSBs for Paging List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the recommended SSBs for paging list.

elementList.name: Recommended SSBs for Paging List Item
SSB Index
elementList.description: Identifier of the recommended SSB beam for paging

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells that can be served by a gNB-DU. Value is 512.
Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: RAN Timing Synchronisation Status Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the RAN timing synchronisation status information provided from the gNB-DU to the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Clock Frequency Stability
elementList.description: Indicates the offsetScaledLogVariance as specified in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Parent Time Source
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (syncE, pTP, gNSS, atomicClock, terrestrialRadio, serialTimeCode, nTP, handSet, other, …)

definitionList.name: Clock Accuracy
descriptionList: This IE indicates the clock accuracy as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Clock Accuracy Value
elementList.description: Indicates the absolute clock accuracy value expressed in units of 25 ns .

elementList.name: Clock Accuracy Index
elementList.description: Indicates the clockAccuracy enumeration value specified in Table 5 of clause 7.6.2.6 of IEEE Std 1588 [48].

definitionList.name: Burst Arrival Time Window
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Burst Arrival Time Window of the TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

elementList.name: Earliest Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Start of the burst arrival time window calculated with reference to the Burst Arrival Time IE, expressed in units of 1 us. Integer values are negative.

elementList.name: Latest Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: End of the burst arrival time window calculated with reference to the Burst Arrival Time IE, expressed in units of 1 us. Integer values are positive.

definitionList.name: Periodicity Range
descriptionList: This IE indicates the periodicity range for the TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [21].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of allowed periodicities. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: TSC Traffic Characteristics Feedback
descriptionList: This IE provides the TSC traffic characteristics feedback of a TSC QoS flow (see TS 23.501 [21]).

definitionList.name: TSC Feedback Information
descriptionList: This IE provides the TSC feedback information for a TSC QoS flow in the uplink or downlink (see TS 23.501 [21]).

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time Offset
elementList.description: Burst arrival time offset expressed in units of 1 us.

elementList.name: Adjusted Periodicity
elementList.description: Not applicable to reactive RAN feedback.

definitionList.name: Mobile TRP Location Information
descriptionList: This IE contains location information for a mobile TRP.

elementList.name: Location Information
elementList.description: Location of the mobile TRP, includes the locationEstimate IE as defined in TS 37.355 [39]

elementList.name: Velocity Information
elementList.description: Velocity of the mobile TRP, includes the velocityEstimate IE as defined in TS 37.355 [39]

elementList.name: Location Time Stamp
elementList.description: Time stamp, indicates the time when the mobile TRP location information is generated

definitionList.name: Global gNB ID
descriptionList: This IE is used to globally identify a gNB (see TS 38.300 [6]).

elementList.name: gNB ID
elementList.description: Equal to the leftmost bits of the NR Cell Identity IE contained in the NR CGI IE of each cell served by the gNB.

definitionList.name: RRC Terminating IAB-Donor Related Info
descriptionList: This IE contains the information related to a mobile IAB-node’s RRC-terminating IAB-donor.

elementList.description: The Global gNB ID of a mobile IAB-node’s RRC-terminating IAB donor.

elementList.name: Mobile IAB-MT BAP Address
elementList.description: The BAP address assigned to the mobile IAB-node by the RRC-terminating IAB-donor.

definitionList.name: Mobile IAB-MT User Location Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the user location information of mobile IAB-MT which is co-located with the mobile IAB-DU.

elementList.name: NR CGI
elementList.description: The NR CGI of the cell, which is the serving cell of the mobile IAB-MT co-located with the mobile IAB-DU that serves the UE.

elementList.name: TAI
elementList.description: The TAI supported by the cell, which is the serving cell of the mobile IAB-MT co-located with the mobile IAB-DU which serves the UE.

definitionList.name: TAI
descriptionList: This IE is used to uniquely identify a Tracking Area.

elementList.name: Associated Session ID
elementList.description: Coded as AssociatedSessionId defined in TS 29.571 [50]. The gNB-DU does not interpret the content of the Associated Session ID IE.

elementList.name: Controller UE

elementList.description: "ptm" indicates that the Multicast F1-U Context is setup for ptm transmissions; decided by the DU. "ptp" indicates that the Multicast F1-U Context is setup for ptp transmissions; decided by the DU. "ptp retransmission" indicates that the Multicast F1-U Context is setup for ptp retransmissions (based on PDCP Status Report); requested by the CU "ptp forwarding" indicates that the Multicast F1-U Context is setup for transmitting from a defined MBS Progress Information status onwards; requested by the CU.

definitionList.name: MBS PTP Retransmission Tunnel Required
descriptionList: This IE indicates the request to establishment of a PTP Retransmission F1-U Tunnel for retransmitting user data for a multicast MBS Session.

definitionList.name: Multicast F1-U Context Reference F1
descriptionList: This IE contains a reference to a Multicast F1-U Context associated with an MBS Session context in a gNB-DU.

elementList.name: Multicast F1-U Bearer Context Reference
elementList.description: This value is allocated to uniquely denote an Multicast F1-U Context within an MBS-associated logical F1-connection.

definitionList.name: MRB Progress Information
descriptionList: This IE contains the MRB progress Information.

definitionList.name: Multicast F1-U Context Reference CU
descriptionList: This IE contains a reference to a Multicast F1-U Context associated with MBS session resources allocated in the gNB-CU.

elementList.name: Multicast F1-U Bearer Context Reference CU
elementList.description: This value is allocated to uniquely denote a Multicast F1-U Context associated with multicast MBS session resources allocated in the gNB-CU. NOTE: If E1 is deployed, the Multicast F1-U Bearer Context Reference CU IE refers to the Multicast F1-U Context ReferenceE1 IE as specified in TS 37.483 [47].
